Unos de sus obstáculos es que las calles aun no han sido terminadas y esto es un problema ya que esto dificultad muchas veces el acceso a los proveedores y a los clientes. Es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos los cuales estudian en escuela particular. El préstamo es para la educación de su hija. Unas de sus metas es que su hija se realice como profesional y que su negocio crezca y tenga mas ventas con el arreglo de las calles.
texts.en:
Gabi C. has had her store for several years; she started out leasing a locale near her house and now she’s relocated and set up her store in her living room thus saving the rental cost.  Gabi sells rice, sugar and vegetables in her store.  Her sister and mother help her but she is the one tending to the store all day.

One of her obstacles is that the streets aren’t finished yet and that’s a problem because both suppliers and customers often have difficult access.

She is a single mother of two children who are going to private school.  The loan is for her daughter’s education.  One of her goals is that her daughter becomes a professional, that her business grows and that once the streets are fixed her sales increase.

loans.use: For her daughter's education.

loans.name: Los Lopez Group

texts.es:
El grupo Los López está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Felix de 56 años quien se dedica al comercio de verduras en el populoso mercado oriental. Ella inicio en este negocio de desde muy joven y poco a poco lo fue aumentando.
Ella con el crédito comprara verduras como zanahoria, chayote, ayote, yuca, quequisque, papa, yerba buena..etc.

Los otros integrantes son María de 25 años se dedica a realizar bordados desde hace 5 años y Terecio quien vende calzado desde hace 10 años.
texts.en:
The “Los López” group has three hard working, dedicated, enterprising members. Félix is 56 years old and is a vegetable merchant at the crowded Oriental Market.  She started the business while still very young and gradually has been expanding it.  She will use the loan to buy vegetables like carrots, chayote, squash, manioc, taro, potato, spearmint, etc.

The other group members are María, 25, who has been making embroidery for five years, and Terencio, who has sold shoes for ten years.

loans.use: For fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Nathmeyya

texts.en:
Nathmeyya and her family run an events rentA. shop. The family rents out chairs of all kinds needed for big events, weddings and parties. Nathmeyya is the mother of two daughters and three sons. One of the sons works in the family business, while the rest are either too young to help or work part time in the shop.

Nathmeyya took out a loan from FATEN to purchase more chairs to rent for severA. occasions in order to serve more people and increase their returns. Nathmeyya is a religious woman, as are most of Gaza Strip citizens; therefore, her son is photographed instead.

loans.use: To purchase chairs that are used in parties and weddings

loans.name: Santos Eduviges

texts.es:
S. D. 39 años D. edad, resiD. en San Simón, departamento D. Morazán, vive con su esposo quien es discapacitado y se moviliza en silla D. ruedas y sus hijos: Marta D. 23 años, Francis D. 21, Marlon D. 18, Immer D. 17, Erick D. 15 y Jerson D. 12 años D. edad, todos son dependientes.
S. tiene 5 años D. dedicarse a una tienda la cual inicio por la necesidad D. tener ingresos económicos para ayudar a sus hijos con los alimentos, la educación y salud, su horario D. venta es D. 6:00am a 6:00pm. Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería como azúcar, frijol, gas, bebidas y productos plásticos. Con esta ayuda espera mejorar la condición D. su negocio y atender mejor a los clientes.
Su objetivo es luchar por su negocio, ya que es su fuente estable D. ingresos y del cual su familia depenD..
texts.en:
S. is 39 years of age and resides in San Simón, a department of Morazán. She lives with her husband who has a disability and requires a wheelchair, as well as her children: Marta (23), Francis (21), Marlon (18), Immer (17), Erick (15) and Jerson (12), all of whom are economically dependent on her.

S. has worked in her store for five years. She started running this business out of economic necessity to help proviD. for the food, education and health of her children. She works from 6:00am to 6:00pm. S. is currently requesting a loan to purchase merchandise including sugar, beans, gas, beverages and plastic products. With this assistance she hopes to improve the conditions of her store and better attend to her customers. Her goal is to fight for her business as it is a stable source of income which her family depend on.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise including sugar, beans, gas, beverages and plastic products.

loans.name: Doris Azucena

texts.es:
Doris, reside en Osicala departamento de Morazán, está casada y vive en casa de sus padres, se dedica a vender ropa, tiene 21 años de edad, Doris tiene un año de dedicarse al negocio, realizándolo todos los días de 8:00am a 4:00pm, visita casa por casa en los alrededores del lugar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo que necesita para comprar ropa (pantalones, peluches y tarjetas) estos artículos los ofrecerá a los clientes, este préstamo le ayudara para tener a disponibilidad mercadería que puede ser demandada.
Las aspiraciones de Doris son adquirir un local estable en el centro De Osicala, aumentar el volumen de ventas y comprar en un futuro su propia casa.
texts.en: Doris lives in Osicala, a department of Morazan; she is married and lives at her parent's home.  Doris is 21 years old and has been selling clothes for a year, operating from 8AM to 4PM going door-to-door at nearby locations.   She is soliciting a loan needed to purchase clothing, ( pants, stuffed animals, and cards) items which would be offered to clients.  This loan will help her have at her disposal merchandise that could be on demand.  Doris aspires to have a stable location at the heart of Osicala, increase the volume of sales, and purchase her own home in the future.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise: Pants, Stuffed animals, cards

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal T. is married to Fat-hi and is the mother of two daughters and three sons. Amal is a housewife and her husband is a National Palestinian Authority employee. Amal's oldest son got married and Amal took out a loan from FATEN to help her son cover the wedding expenses. He is an employee with a decent salary.

Amal is a religious woman from Rafah – that's why her husband appears in the picture here instead.

loans.use: To pay for one of Amal's son's wedding expenses

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es:
La señora Teresa de Jesús C. de 36 años tiene un pequeño salón de belleza el cual inicio hace 16 años con un espejo, unas cuantas sillas, tijeras, etc. actualmente ha ido mejorando las condiciones, infraestructura y productos que necesita su negocio.
Ella invertirá el crédito en cosméticos especialmente tintes y maquillaje etc.
texts.en: Mrs. Teresa de Jesús Compas, 36, has a small beauty salon that she started 16 years ago with a mirror, a few chairs, scissors, etc.  She has been improving its conditions, infrastructure and products the business needs gradually.  She will use the loan to buy cosmetics, especially hair color, make up, etc.

loans.use: For cosmetics, hair color, etc.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Don Tomas, tiene 50 años de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la venta de hamacas y Jarcia, vive con su esposa y cinco hijas, María de la Paz de 19 años, Sandra de 18, Guadalupe, Blanca Lidia de 13 y Adeyda de 11 años de edad, todas aun son dependientes. 
El Negocio de don Tomas fue heredado por su padre y los productos los vende en el mercado municipal de Corinto los días miércoles, sábado y domingo de 6:00am a 2:00pm, tiene 20 años de estar en este negocio que le ha dado hasta el momento lo necesario para cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
El actualmente solicita un préstamo, que lo piensa invertir en hamacas por docenas y lazos, esta inversión le permitirá responder a las necesidades de los clientes con nuevos productos en el inventario, los riesgos serian las ventas que en un momento dado pueden bajar.
La aspiración de don Tomas es mantener el negocio fuerte, atender bien a los clientes, ofrecer siempre buenos productos y velar por el bienestar de su familia que es muy numerosa.
texts.en:
Tomas is 50 years of age and lives in the Corinto department of Morazán. He sells hammocks and rope and lives with his wife and five daughters: María de la Paz (19), Sandra (18), Guadalupe, Blanca Lidia (13) and Adeyda (11), all of whom are dependent on him financially.
 
Tom inherited this business from his father and sells products in the municipal market of Corinto on Wednesdays, Saturdays and Sundays from 6:00am to 2:00pm. He has worked in this business for 20 years and up until now it has given him everything he requires to cover his family's needs. 

He is currently applying for a loan to invest in rope and hammocks by the dozen. This investment will help him to cater for his customers' needs with new products in his inventory. The risks are that he could experience a downturn in sales from one moment to the next.

Tomas' aspirations are to keep his business strong, attend to his clients well, always offer good quality products and ensure the well being of his numerous family.

loans.use: To purchase hammocks and rope

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, de 37 años de edad,  reside en Sociedad, departamento de Morazán, su negocio es una tienda y venta de electrodomésticos, su esposa es Miriam y tienen dos hijos Erick Omar de 12 años y Luis Gustavo de 9 años de edad.
El negocio de Luis lo tiene hace un año, lo administra junto a su esposa, la venta de electrodomésticos la realiza de forma ambulante, mientras que la tienda la tiene ubicada en su casa atendiéndola de 7:00am a 6:00pm. Actualmente solicita un préstamo para surtir la tienda, comprando productos de uso domestico, esto mejorara la atención a los clientes, ofreciéndoles productos muy necesarios en cada hogar y de calidad.
Para Luis su aspiración es que el negocio sea fuerte y estable en las ventas, que los ingresos mejoren y dar un mejor futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 37 years of age and lives in Sociedad in the department of Morazán. He runs a store selling electrical appliances. He is married to Miriam and they have two children: Erick Omar (12) and Luis Gustavo (9).

Luis has had this business for one year and administers it together with his wife. They sell electrical appliances as street vendors, operating the store from their home from 7:00am to 6:00pm. 

They are currently requesting a loan to stock up their store and purchase products for domestic use. This will improve their customer service as they will be able to offer their customers necessary quality products for their home. 

Luis' aspirations are to have a strong and stable business, improve his income and give his family a better future.

loans.use: Compra de mercaderia para el negocio.

loans.name: Genesis Group

texts.es:
El grupo Génesis está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedora una de ellas es la señora Sandra Carolina R. quien tiene una serigrafía y vende cosméticos. Ella inicio con la serigrafía de calzado desde hace 15 años junto con su esposo y a sus tres hijos les han enseñado el oficio de decorar zapatos.
Ella invertirá el crédito en pinturas y otros materiales para la serigrafía.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Elisabeth Cruz quien vende plata y cosméticos y Juana Cristina M. vende verduras en el oriental.
texts.en:
The “Génesis” group has three hard working, enterprising members.  One of them is Mrs. Sandra Carolina R. who has a silk-screening printing shop and also sells cosmetics.  She started out silk screening footwear 15 years ago with her husband and they have taught their three children the shoe decorating occupation.  She will use the loan for paints and other silk screening supplies.

The other group members are Elisabeth Cruz who sells silver and cosmetics and Juana Cristina M. who is a vegetable merchant at the Oriental Market.

loans.use: For paint.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
La señora Bertha Abarca G. Machado es una mujer luchadora, emprendedora y trabajadora quien inicio en el comercio de bisutería etc. luego cuando empezó a trabajar en la zona franca para poder sostener a su familia como ingreso extra se dedicó a vender ropa junto con su hermana. 
Su mayor sueño es superarse tener una pequeña tienda.
texts.en: Mrs. Bertha G. Abarca Machado is a hard working, enterprising, tenacious woman who started out in the costume jewelry, etc. business.  Later, when she started working in the tax-free zone to earn extra income to support her family she started selling clothes with her sister.  Her greatest dream is to improve herself and have a small store.

loans.use: For clothes.

loans.name: Darling

texts.es:
La señora Darling del Socorro L. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de especie desde hace 8 años con lo cual ha sacado adelante a sus 6 hijos de 18, 17, 16, 14, 10 y 4 años los cuales estudian y en el tiempo libre trabajan con ella.
Ella invertirá en caramelo, manzanilla, romero, clavo de olor, yerba buena, etc.
texts.en: Mrs. Darling del Socorro L. is a hard working, dedicated, enterprising woman who has been a spice merchant for the last 8 years.  This has made it possible for her to support her six children who are 18, 17, 16, 14, 10, and 4 years of age who are in school and work with her in their spare time.  She will use the loan to buy spices like chamomile, rosemary, cloves, spearmint, etc.

loans.use: For spices.

loans.name: José Alfredo

texts.es:
A  la vivienda del señor José M. le está haciendo falta la barda perimetral,  porque al no tenerla está haciendo que su casa no sea segura para su esposa e hijo. Por lo que está solicitando un crédito para pagarle a la persona que la construirá así como comprar el material para hacer dicha barda.
Debido a que el señor José y su esposa trabajan, pagar dicho crédito no será un problema porque la señora Blanca le ayudara con algunos de los gastos de la casa, y así el podrá utilizar sus ingresos como transfer para pagar dicho crédito,  porque los dos desea brindarle el mejor patrimonio a su hijo.
texts.en: Jose M.'s home is missing a perimeter fence.  Not having it is making the home unsafe for his wife and child.  This is why he is requesting a loan, in order to pay the person who will build it and to also purchase the materials for the fence.  Since Jose and his wife work, paying the loan will not be a problem because his wife Blanca will help with some of the household expenses.  This way he can utilize his earnings as a transfer towards the loan.  Both parents wish to offer the best patrimony to their child.

loans.use: Install a perimeter fence.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
Flora Argentina Muños de 45 años vende fresco, enchiladas, helado, hielo y frutas desde hace tres años. Ella inicio con la venta de hielo y poco a poco fue aumentado su negocio con el cual sustenta a sus cuatro hijos que están acargo de ella de 20, 16, 14 y 13 años los cual estudian y en sus tiempos libre le ayudan. 
Muños invertirá en frutas e ingredientes para los frescos.
texts.en: Flora Argentina M., 45, has sold “fresco” (smoothie-like fruit drink), enchiladas, ice cream, ice and fruit.  She started out selling ice and gradually expanded the business with which she supports the four children in her care who are 20, 16, 14 and 13 years old.  They all go to school and help her in their spare time.  She will buy fruit and ingredients for the frescos.

loans.use: For fruit, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Juana Margarita

texts.es:
Juana de 53 años, es una mujer trabajadora y muy dedicada a lo que le gusta ya que comenzó a realizar pinturas ya que había tomado un curso de arte. 

Decidió tener su propio negocio de pinturas para obtener dinero de lo que le gustaba hacer. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta 17h00pm. Vende los cuadros a $ 25.00, centros de mesa a $ 12.00 y floreros a $ 20.00. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio ya que hace lo que le gusta y gana dinero. 

Por eso quiere continuar con su negocio para seguir trabajando y ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Con el préstamo quiere comprar pinceles y herramientas para sus cuadros y artes manuales. Una de sus metas es tener una galería con sus cuadros.
texts.en:
Juana, 53, is a hard working woman who is very dedicated to what she enjoys.  She started making paintings after having taken an art course.

She decided to turn the paintings into a business to earn her own money doing what she liked to do.  She currently works from 8am until 5pm.  She sells the paintings for $25.00, table centerpieces for $12.00 and flower vases for $20.00.  She has many hopes for the business because she does what she enjoys doing and makes money at it.

Because of this she wants to stay in business to continue working and help her husband with household expenses.  She will use the loan to buy paint brushes and tools for her paintings and manual arts.  One of her goals it to have a gallery for her paintings.

loans.use: Paint brushes and tools.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
Doña María Dolores, tiene 64 años D. edad, resiD. en Corinto departamento D. Morazán, vive con su esposo don Leonor y tres nietos Eliseo D. 24, Marlene D. 21 y Juan pablo D. 15 años D. edad.
Doña María ha trabajado junto a su esposo en la agricultura y crianza D. aves D. corral (gallinas, patos, jolotes), sus nietos también colaboran con las actividades, ella se levanta desD. muy temprano a las 4:00 D. la mañana para iniciar su labor cotidiana.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la recolección y almacenamiento D. granos básicos,  ya que por seguridad guardan esta producción para que le sirva durante vario tiempo.
Ella quiere seguir trabajando por dar a su familia lo necesario y mejorar el futuro a sus nietos.
texts.en:
Maria Dolores is 64 years of age and lives in the Corinto department of Morazán. She lives with her husband Leonor and their three grandchildren: Eliseo (24), Marlene (21) and Juan Pablo (15).

Maria works in agriculture and raises poultry (chickens, ducks, turkeys) together with her husband and her grandchildren who also help out. Maria gets up very early at 4:00 in the morning to begin her daily tasks.

Maria is currently requesting a loan to invest in the collection and storage of pulses, so she can save them to keep and use for a long time to come.

Maria wants to continue working to give her family everything they need and improve her grandchildren's future.

loans.use: To collect and store pulses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For rice, oil and soft drinks.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María resiD. en Corinto departamento D. Morazán, tiene 33 años D. edad, vive en compañía D. su esposo Víctor Alfonso quien está trabajando como Electricista, tienen dos hijos Eliseo D. 11 años y Ariela D. 2 años D. edad.
María tiene el negocio D. venta D. celulares y accesorios desD. hace un año, esta idea surgió por la necesidad D. ayudar a su esposo con los ingresos para el hogar, y poder crear condiciones más favorables para sus hijos, el horario D. atención es D. 7:00am a 5:00pm. Actualmente necesita la compra D. teléfono y accesorios para abastecer la vitrina ya que debe estar actualizándose con lo nuevo en el mercado, por lo que solicita un préstamo D. $500.00 dólares para realizar la inversión.
Su objetivo es surtir el negocio, atraer a los clientes con más mercadería y nuevos estilos, ya que trabajando día con día espera mantenerse como comerciante para generar un futuro mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria lives in Corinto, a department of Morazan; she is 33 years old and lives with her husband Victor Alfonso who works as an electrician.  She has 2 children, Eliseo who is 11 and Ariela who is 2 years old.  Maria has a business selling cell phones and accessories for a year now, an idea that arised from the need to help her husband with income for the home and to create more favorable conditions for her children.  Business hours are from 7AM to 5PM.  She actually needs to purchase the phones and accessories to stock the showcase since she needs to be up to date with the newest in the market; which is why she request a $500.00 (USD) loan to make the investment.
Her objective is to stock the business and attract clients with more merchandise and newer styles. Working daily, she hopes to remain as a merchant and generate a better future for her family.

loans.use: Purchase cell phones and accessories

loans.name: Griselda De La Paz

texts.es:
Doña Griselda, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, tiene 40 años de edad, administra una tienda de consumo, vive con su esposo don Gabino, dos hijos Maritza de 16 y Jorge de 14 años de edad, los dos estudian.
El negocio de doña Griselda tiene 4 años de existir, y fue iniciativa propia, para ayudar a don Gabino con otra fuente de ingreso que solventara necesidades y les ayudara a mantener el hogar estable. Por el momento ella necesita un préstamo para invertir en el negocio ya que desea surtirlo de mercadería y no cuenta con las facilidades económicas, por lo que este préstamo le servirá para crecer con mercadería de la cual a diario demandan los clientes.
Los sueños de ella son crecer con el negocio tanto en mercadería como en el local que sea más amplio, estabilizar los ingresos y ayudar a su grupo familiar con todo lo que sea posible.
texts.en:
Doña Griselda lives in Corinto, in Morazán department. She is 40 years old and runs a general store. She lives with her husband Don Gabino, and their 2 children Maritza, 16, and Jorge, 14, who are both studying.

Doña Griselda's business has been around for 4 years and was her own initiative, intended to help Don Gabino by providing another source of income that would pay for necessities and help them maintain a stable home. At present she needs a loan to invest in the business because she would like to stock it with more merchandise, and doesn't have the funds to do so. The loan will therefore be used to expand her stock with items her customers request every day.

Her dreams are to grow her business and stock so much that she will need bigger premises, to stabilise the income form the business, and to help her family in every possible way.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 42 años D. edad, resiD. en San Miguel, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 5, 8 y 9 años D. edad, se dedica a la sastrería desD. hace un año, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta D. comida, ambos negocio fueron fundados por iniciativa propia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar una máquina D. coser, ya que esta herramienta es la principal para realizar bien su trabajo, esta inversión le ayudara muchísimo pues podrá salir con todos los pedidos D. forma ágil. 
Doña María quiere fortalecer el negocio y garantizar trabajo a futuro, ganando clientes y ayudar a su familia, que sus hijos culminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Doña María is 42 years old and lives in San Miguel with her husband and three children (ages 5, 8, and 9). She has worked as a seamstress for a year. María previously sold food. She started both businesses through her own initiative.

María is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine, since this is the main piece of equipment she uses for her work. This investment will be a great help because she can proceed with completing all of her orders with relative ease.

Doña María wants to strengthen her business, guarantee a stream of work for the future, attract more customers, help her family, and see that her children complete their studies.

loans.use: Purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase balcony rails & a door for her home

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Doña Ana, es una señora dedicada al cultivo agrícola y una tienda, tiene 61 años de edad, vive con un hijo de 38 años de edad, residen en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel. Doña Ana en temporada de cultivo siembra maíz y la tienda existe desde hace 5 años,  estas son sus ocupaciones diarias.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería y  abastecer su inventario, pues se ve en la necesidad de invertir ya que muchas veces se le agotan los productos, lo que le puede ocasionar molestia en los clientes, su iniciativa de inversión es buena ya que le permitirá está al pendiente de los gustos y necesidades de los clientes.
Su principal propósito en mantener el negocio competente, bien surtido para mejorar la atención y desde luego obtener mejores ganancias las cuales servirán para cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Doña Ana is a woman who is devoted to farming and managing a store. She is 61 years old and lives with her 38 year old son in San Rafael Oriente in the Department of San Miguel. Doña Ana is currently planting corn and her store has been in existence for five years. She manages both businesses every day.

Doña Ana is requesting a loan to buy merchandise to restock her inventory. She feels the need to invest frequently because she runs out of products, which creates an inconvenience for her customers. Her drive to invest allows her to cater to the tastes and needs of her customers.

Doña Ana’s main goals are to manage a competent business, remain well-stocked, and improve her service. Later on, she hopes to improve her revenues so that she can cover the family expenses.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her store

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a 21-year-old wife and the mother of one daughter and one son. Her husband, Bilal, is a taxi driver in the city of Rafah in Gaza Strip. Samar's husband has been a taxi driver for five years. His car needs urgent maintenance. Samar took out a loan from FATEN as her husband can't cover the expenses all at once, and it would be easier to pay back on a monthly basis.

Samar's husband appears in the picture here as Samar is a conservative woman.

loans.use: For urgent maintenance work on a taxi

loans.name: Fredis Armando

texts.es:
Fredis de 39 años de edad, reside en la Ciudad de San Miguel, se dedica a la carpintería, este negocio se fundó hace 6 años, por iniciativa propia cuando ingreso como empleado de una carpintería, ahí Fredis aprendió lo necesario para trabajar por su propia cuenta, trabajando de lunes a domingo de 6:00am a 5:00pm.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de madera, pintura, clavos y pegamentos, esta inversión le ayudara a mantener a su disposición todos los materiales necesarios para la fabricación de muebles, también será ayuda porque sus trabajos los realizara de una forma más eficiente y rápido.
Su objetivo es mantener el negocio en las mejores condiciones, desempeñar su trabajo cada día mejor, y prosperar económicamente.
texts.en:
Fredis is 39 years old and lives in the city of San Miguel where he works as a carpenter. He started his business six years ago when he was still employed at a carpentry shop. There he learned everything he needed to know so that he could work on his own. Fredis currently works Monday through Sunday, from 6am to 5pm.

He is requesting a loan to buy wood, paint, nails, and glue. This investment will enable him to have all the necessary materials at his disposal for making furniture. Fredis will also be able to complete his work in a more efficient and timely manner.

His goals include maintaining his business under the best conditions, completing his work each day, and prospering financially.

loans.use: Purchase wood, paint, nails, and glue

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand the business.

loans.name: Rani

texts.en:
Rani is a young man from Rafah city in Gaza Strip. Rani started a mobile phone store one year ago. He sells mobile phones and phone accessories. The store is still new but attracts a good number of customers; therefore, Rani took out a loan from FATEN to purchase more phones and increase his sales.

Rani is photographed in the picture here in his store in Rafah.

loans.use: To purchase mobile phones to increase sales

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Doña Elizabeth, tiene 49 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, vive con su hija de 14 años de edad quien estudia, el negocio de doña Elizabeth es la venta de Oro y enchapes, este negocio tiene aproximadamente 24 años de existir.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para surtir el negocio con nuevos estilos en joyas, que le permita aumentar sus ventas y agradar a los clientes.
El propósito de doña Elizabeth es tener trabajo para seguir aportando para su hija los recursos necesarios para que pueda estudiar y superarse.
texts.en:
Doña Elizabeth is 49 years old and lives in San Miguel with her 14 year old daughter who is in school. She sells gold and gold plated jewelry. Elizabeth has been in business for approximately 24 years.

She is requesting a loan to restock her business with new styles of jewelry. This will help increase her sales and keep her customers happy. Doña Elizabeth’s goal is to continue working so that she can provide her daughter the necessary resources to continue her education and succeed.

loans.use: Purchase new styles of jewelry

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
El Sr. O., es una persona mayor de edad, casado convive con su Familia den la comarca la Palma San Lorenzo, Tecolostote, se dedica a la actividad de la Pezca artesanal de donde obtiene sus ingresos para el sustento diario de su adorada Familia, es una persona responsable.  

Solicita su primer credito con el apoyo de Kiva, para invertirlo en Mejora de su vivienda ya que pretende construir una parte de concreto, por lo que actualmente es de madera, y asi poco a poco ir mejorando la infraestructura de su casa; siendo esta el patrimonio que heredara a sus hijos. 
Su mauor sueño es llegar a realizar su casa con todas las mejoras y que no le falte el pan de cada dia.
texts.en:
Mr. O. is an adult who is married and lives with his family in the Palma San Lorenzo region near Tecolostote.  He works fishing in the traditional way which is where he gets the income he uses for the daily expenses of the family he loves.  He is a responsible person.

He is requesting his first loan with the support of Kiva to invest it in improving his home as he would like to build a part with concrete where now it is made from wood.  In this way he can improve the infrastructure of his house little by little as this is the inheritance that his children will receive.

His biggest dreams are to complete his house with all of the improvements and that they never lack for their daily bread.

loans.use: to repair a part of his house by changing it from wood to concrete.

loans.name: Donald Enrique

texts.es:
El Sr. Donald de 26 años de edad, vive con su esposa quien se dedica a los queahceres del hogar y al cuido de una niña de un añito de edad que tienen en conjunto, es una familia muy unidad; Donald es medico General, atiende actualmente en un Centro de salud ubicado en Mazapa, Tecolostote, es una persona responsable y muy dedicado.   

Solicita su primer credito con el apoyo de Kiva para terminar de construir su casa de habitacion, pues pretende ponerle techo y piso que aun le falta.  

Su sueño es poder ver realizada su Vivienda, darles un techo digno a su familia y mantenerse siempre en union Familiar.
texts.en:
Mr. Donald is 26 years old and lives with is wife who is a homemaker and takes care of their one-year old daughter.  They are a very close family.  Donald is a general doctor and practices in a health center in Mazapa, Tecolostote.  He is a responsible, dedicated person.

He is requesting his first loan with Kiva's support to finish building his house.  He plans to add roofing and flooring which it still does not have.

His dream is to see his house finished in order to provide a dignified home for his family so they can always stay together.

loans.use: To add roofing and flooring to his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy materials for gara cloth production

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add more stock to her business

loans.name: Husain

texts.en:
Husain is a 54-year-old father of four daughters and two sons. He is a carpenter. Husain produces furniture in his workshop as well as doors and windows. Husain's oldest son is a Palestinian National Authority employee. 

Husain took out a loan from FATEN to purchase a faster machine for cutting wood as well as a large amount of wood to produce more furniture and increase his profit.

Husain appears in the picture above in FATEN's branch in Jenin.

loans.use: To purchase wood and a wood cutting machine for the workshop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more food  for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase more food items for his shop

loans.name: Jamal

texts.en:
Jamal is a 43-year-old man, a husband and the father of four daughters and three sons. Jamal has a bakery in Hebron city. He makes all kinds of local sweets and desserts.

Jamal, who is photographed in FATEN's branch in Hebron, moved to a new house recently. He bought as much furniture as he could cover. He needed $3000 to purchase the rest of the needed items such as kitchen tools, chairs and tables. Jamal took out a loan from FATEN.

loans.use: To purchase home furniture

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more local food for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more assorted food items for resale.

loans.name: Waseem

texts.en:
Waseem is an employee with a decent salary. He lives with his parents and shares with his father and his brothers the responsibility for taking care of the household expenses. Waseem took out a loan from FATEN to purchase new bedroom furniture for his sisters. Waseem's salary doesn't help him to buy the furniture so he took out a loan.

Waseem appears in the picture here in FATEN's branch in Hebron.

loans.use: To purchase home furniture

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more clothing for her stall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay back family housing expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bales of used clothing for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more drums of fuel for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy raw material to produce gara (dyed fabric) clothing

loans.name: Duaa

texts.en:
Duaa is a young woman from Nablus city, north Palestine. Duaa is recently married and has no kids yet. Duaa's husband runs a locA. food restaurant. He makes the locA. breakfast dishes in his restaurant which is located in the old city of Nablus.

Duaa's husband wants to improve the restaurant by preparing a space for customers to sit in and have breakfast in the restaurant. Duaa took out a loan from FATEN to have this space prepared and attract more customers.

Since Duaa is a conservative woman, her husband appears in the picture here as she doesn't want her picture posted on the web.

loans.use: To prepare a space for customers to improve a local food restaurant

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more assorted items for her shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy more palm oil for her business

loans.name: Shahinaz

texts.en:
Shahinaz is a professional tailor. She makes women's clothes in her house. Shahinaz's husband is a National Palestinian Authority employee. Shahinaz has three young sons who are school students. She hired another tailor to work with her as the workload is increasing. Shahinaz took out a loan from FATEN to purchase a sewing machine for the woman hired to work with her.

Shahinaz and her husband appear in the picture above in FATEN's office.

loans.use: To purchase a second sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Additonal assorted utensils - pans, bowls, bucket, rubbers etc. in larger quantities

loans.name: El Control (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal El Control esta formado por 9 mujeres que son muy unidas, responsables y trabajan en diferentes actividades que les ha permitido  mejorar su situación económica. Viven por la parroquia de Turi, esta parroquia se caracteriza por ser el mirador de la ciudad de Cuenca, es muy visitada por propios y extraños, su gente se dedica al comercio, agricultura y cría de animales.

La Señora. Laura Azucena Gómez vive por el sector de Punta Corral, este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y fue  invitada por una vecina. Tiene 34 años, es casada y  tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 6 años de edad quienes estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es mecánico industrial, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en la casa de su papá con quien comparte los gastos.
Doña Laura se dedica a la  cría de patos, también lava ropa en diferentes casas varios días a la semana.
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de un derecho de agua potable para su hogar. Su meta es que su esposo tenga su mecánica propia en donde pueda trabajar.

La Señora Transito de los Angeles Gómez vive en la comunidad de Punta Corral que pertenece a la parroquia de Turi, tiene 40 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 20, 18 y 15 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive independiente, su segundo hijo estudia y trabaja, su ultima hija estudia en una academia de belleza. Su esposo labora en la construcción y es maestro de albañilería, con el trabajo conyugal han construido su casa propia. 
Nuestra socia se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y a la cría de pollos y cerdos, actividad que la realiza en su casa.
Se encuentra en su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y  lo va a invertir en la comprar de un derecho de agua potable que le hace falta en su hogar. Su meta es tener algún negocio en su casa.
texts.en:
The communal bank El Control is made up of 9 united and responsible women who work in different activities which have allowed them to improve their economic situation. They live in the Turi parish, which is characterized by being the viewpoint over the city of Cuenca and is well-visited by both locals and foreigners. The people of this parish work in commerce, agriculture, and animal husbandry.

Mrs. Laura Azucena Gómez lives in the Punta Corral sector and this is her first loan in the communal bank after being invited by a neighbour. She is 34 years old, married, and has 2 children aged 9 and 6 years who study at the city's primary school. He husband is an industrial mechanic. They don't have their own house which is why they live in her father's house and share the expenses with him. Laura raises ducks and washes clothes in various houses on different days of the week. She is going to use the money from her loan to buy the right to potable water for her home. Her goal is for her husband to have his own workshop to work in.

Mrs. Transito de los Angeles Gómez lives in the community of Punta Corral belonging to the Turi parish. She is 40 years old, married with 3 children aged 20, 18, and 15. Her oldest son is married and lives independantly, her second oldest son studies and works, and her youngest daughter studies at beauty school. Her husband works in construction and is a master bricklayer. With both of their work they have managed to build their own house. This member does the household chores and raises chickens and pigs, an activity which she carries out at home. This is the first loan she has requested in her communal bank and she is going to invest it in the purchase of rights to potable water, which is lacking in her home. Her goal is to have a home-based business.

loans.use: To buy the rights to drinking water

loans.name: Alfonsina

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal María Asunción se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.

Aquí  tuvimos la oportunidad de dialogar es la señora Alfonsina, es casada  y tiene su hogar muy bien formalizado,  ella tuvo dos hijos pero uno de ellos falleció. El esposo es profesor en el colegio Nacional Picoaza.

Ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa y sabanas y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, dice que empezó su negocio con el primer crédito que recibió del Banco, trabaja cuatro días a la semana y los fines de semana cobra ya que deja a crédito. Para poder surtir su negocio tiene que viajar hasta las ciudades de Guayaquil y Quito cada 15 días. En la actualidad lo que más vende es ropa de temporada como trajes de baño, bermudas y gorras. También está vendiendo bisuterías y gafas sobretodo de damas.

Este nuevo crédito lo invertirá en sabanas, gafas, bisutería y ropa de temporada. Ella es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y está muy agradecida con la Fundación Espoir ya que gracias ellos pudo empezar su negocio. El sueño de nuestra socia es llegar a tener su almacén con todos los servicios para sus clientes.
texts.en:
The village bank Maria Asuncion meets every 15 days in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo.  This place is known for being a commercial zone, and for its traditional festivals of San Pedro and San Pablo, as well as for the happiness of its people.  

Here we had the opportunity to speak with Alfonsina.  She is married and has her home well put together.  She had two children, but one of them passed away.  Her husband is a teacher at the Picoaza National school.  

She sells clothes and sheets door-to-door.  She says that she began her business with the first loan that she received from the bank.  She works 4 days a week and on the weekends she collects money for the orders that she left on credit.  In order to furnish goods for her business she has to travel to the cities of Guayaquil and Quito every 15 days.  Currently she mostly sells seasonal clothing, like bathing suits, shorts and caps.  She also sells miscellaneous goods and sunglasses, mostly for women. 

This new loan will be invested in sheets, sunglasses, miscellaneous goods and seasonal clothing.  She is a founding member of the village bank and is very grateful to the Espoir Foundation since she was able to start her business thanks to them.  Her dream is to have a shop with all of the services for her customers.

loans.use: To buy sheets, glasses, miscellaneous goods and seasonal clothing

loans.name: Irlanda Cecilia

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal María Asunción se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.

Aquí encontramos a la Señora Irlanda, tiene 49 años de edad, está separada pero de esta relación tuvo 3 hijos los cuales son mayores de edad, todos viven independientes y ella vive con un hermano.

Se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo de algunas marcas, su sistema de venta es puerta a puerta, ella ofrece sus productos, los anota y luego realiza los pedidos mes a mes en un local en el centro de Portoviejo y ahí mismo recibe los pedidos. En la actualidad esta también vendiendo zapatillas y sandalias de temporada, trabaja todos los días ya que las ventas han aumentado, cobra la mitad en la entrega y después de quince días la totalidad.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar sandalias, zapatillas, camisetas, trajes de baño, bermudas y todo tipo de ropa de temporada que es lo que más salida tiene en la actualidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 10 años y le gusta la forma de trabajar de la institución. Sus metas son seguir creciendo y tener su propio local.
texts.en:
The village bank Maria Asuncion meets every 15 days in the parish of Picoaza in the city of Portoviejo.  It is a place know for its commercial zone, traditional festivals of San Pedro and San Pablo, and for the happiness of its people.

Here we find Irlanda, 49 years old, and separated from the father of her 3 children who are all grown and live on their own.  Irlanda lives with one of her brothers.  

She sells several brands of catalog clothing door-to-door.  She offers her products, notes them down, and then meets the requests monthly in a store in the center of Portoviejo, where she also receives orders.  Currently she is also selling tennis shoes and seasonal sandals.  She works every day now that her sales have increased.  She charges half upon delivery, and the remainder within 15 days.  

This credit will be used to buy sandals, tennis shoes, t-shirts, bathing suits, shorts and all kinds of seasonal clothing, which is what is selling the most right now.  She has been part of the village bank for 10 years and likes the way the institution works.  Her goals are to continue growing and to have her own store.

loans.use: To buy sandals, tennis shoes, t-shirts, bathing suits, shorts and seasonal clothing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to solve her problems and have a good life

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy bigger shop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase new tools for carpentry shop

loans.name: Shereen

texts.en: Shereen is a 28-year-old single woman from Nablus. She owns her own shop selling beauty products. She hopes that through this loan she will be able to buy new beauty products for her store. She believes that this will help increase her income and bring in more customers.

loans.use: To buy new beauty products for her store

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en: Abdullah is a 33-year-old married man who lives with his wife and daughter in Gaza. In 2007, he opened his own butcher shop. He hopes that through this loan he will be able to add a new section to his butcher shop in which he sells meat and frozen fish. This will bring in more customers and increase his income.

loans.use: To add a new section to his butcher shop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To invest in expanding the business.

loans.name: Rudy Antonio

texts.es:
Rudy, de 38 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a vender comida, él vive con su esposa Lorena y sus dos hijos Daniel de 5 años y Ana de 9 años de edad. Rudy vende desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, este negocio lo tiene en su casa de habitación lo atiende junto a su esposa trabajando desde hace 5 años.
Actualmente necesitan comprar una mesa térmica para mostrar y conservar el calor en la comida, por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar ducha compra, ya que él no tiene suficientes fondos por lo que recurre al financiamiento, su intensión es mejorar la imagen del negocio y el servicio a los clientes, ya que esta mesa le ayudara a mantener la comida a una temperatura adecuada por más tiempo.
Su aspiración en cuanto al negocio es mejorar las ventas, atender a muchos clientes y por consiguiente mejorar también la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Rudy is 38 years old and resides in San Miguel in the Department of San Miguel. He sells food. Rudy lives with his wife Lorena and their two children, Daniel (age 5) and Ana (age 9).

He sells breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Rudy and his wife operate their business out of their home. They have been working together for five years.

Rudy currently needs to buy a thermal buffet table for displaying the food and keeping it warm. He is requesting a loan to make this purchase because he does not have sufficient funds. Rudy intends to improve the image of his business and provide better service to his customers. The buffet table will help preserve the food at the correct temperature over a long period of time.

His business aspirations are to improve his sales and serve many customers, thereby improving the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: Purchase a thermal buffet table

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Alicia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Doña Alicia, reside en San Miguel, tiene 43 años de edad, vive con su hija de 23 años de edad, el negocio es la venta de pupusas, vende los días de martes a sábado, los domingos los dedica a vender hamacas que es otro negocio al cual le dedica solamente un día a la semana.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería tanto para hacer las pupusas como chicharrón, quesillo, aceite así también hamacas, esto contribuirá para que pueda contar con lo necesario y continuar en el negocio.
El sueño de doña Alicia es algún día a través del negocio pueda comprar su propia casa.
texts.en:
Doña Alicia, age 43, lives in San Miguel with her 23 year old daughter. She manages a business selling pupusas Tuesday through Saturday. On Sundays, she sells hammocks and manages this business only one day a week.

Alicia is requesting a loan to buy supplies for making pupusas such as pork, cheese, and oil. In addition, she will buy hammocks so that she will have the necessary inventory to continue her business.

Through her business, Doña Alicia dreams of someday being able to buy her own home.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for making "pupusas" & acquire hammocks to sell for her other business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase corn

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Rhina Senayda

texts.es:
Rhina, tiene 33 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su familia, tiene 4 hijos de 3 años, 6 años, 10 y 14 años de edad, Rhina se dedica a una tienda y vende Hot Dog, la tienda está instalada en su casa, lo cual está pendiente de atender a los clientes la mayor parte del tiempo, las ventas de Hot Dog, ella prepara la venta y tiene empleados que se desplazan en bicicletas recorriendo varios lugares de San Miguel ofreciendo y vendiendo los Hot Dog, lleva ya 10 años de dedicarse a este negocio.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprar bicicletas con carretón y otra parte en mercadería para la tienda, esta inversión le ayudara con el negocio, ya que al disponer de más bicicletas podrá emplear a nuevos trabajadores y aumentar su producción.
Su objetivo es trabajar fuertemente por lograr una empresa propia que logre abastecer varios lugares, mejorando su condición económica y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rhina is 33 years old and lives with her family in San Miguel in the Department of San Miguel. She has four children (ages 3, 6, 10, and 14). Rhina manages a store and is also a hot dog vendor. Her store is located in her home, which allows her to attend to her customers most of the time. For her hot dog business, she prepares the food and then her employees travel on bicycles to different places throughout San Miguel offering and selling hot dogs. Rhina has been in this business for ten years.

She currently needs a loan to acquire bicycle carts as well as merchandise for her store. This investment will help her with her businesses. She needs the additional bicycles because she plans to hire new employees and increase her production.

Her goals include working hard to expand her business to more places and improving the financial condition of her family.

loans.use: Purchase bicycle carts for selling hot dogs & merchandise for her store

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca, tiene 37 años, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive con sus hijos de 10 y 8 años de edad, los cuales dependen económicamente de ella. El negocio de Blanca comienza desde las 10 de la mañana, su ventaja es que no existe otra persona cerca que venda tortillas por lo que eso le genera clientela.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar maíz, leña y gas, esto le ayudara a generar mayor producción, a cubrir la demanda y generar mejores ingresos para salir de sus gastos, lo cual le ayudara a brindar una excelente atención y servicio a los clientes.
El objetivo de Blanca es mantenerse en el negocio, aumentar su ganancia para algún día poder comprar su casa.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 37, lives in San Miguel in the Department of San Miguel with her children (ages 10 and 8) who are financially dependent on her. She sells tortillas and begins her work at 10am. Her advantage is that there are no other tortilla vendors nearby, so she is able to attract customers.

Blanca is requesting a loan to buy corn, firewood, and gas. This will help her increase production, keep up with demand, and generate more income so that she can stay ahead of her expenses. As a result, she will be able to provide excellent care and service to her customers.

Blanca’s goals include maintaining her business and increasing her revenues so that she will be able to buy a house someday.

loans.use: Purchase corn, firewood, and gas

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Nancy Marlene

texts.es:
Nancy, reside en Berlín departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos, tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su padre un señor de 68 años de edad y una hermana de 23 años; El negocio lo inicio hace 10 años, por iniciativa propia, y lo tiene ubicado en el Mercado Municipal de Berlín, el horario de venta es de 7:00am a 5:00pm.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería: Blusas, faldas, toallas, lociones, maquillaje y demás productos de belleza, con esta inversión Nancy espera fortalecer el negocio, ver la posibilidad de tener más ventas e ir progresando.
Las aspiraciones de ella es tener el negocio amplio y fuerte en mercadería, que el servicio a los clientes sea cada vez más eficiente y mejorar el sistema de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Nancy lives in Berlín in the department of Usulután, and sells clothing and cosmetics.  She is 37 years old and lives with her father who is 68 and her sister, 23.  She set up her business 10 years ago on her own initiative and is located in the Municipal Market of Berlín.  Her business hours are from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise such as blouses, skirts, towels, lotions, make-up and other beauty products.  With this investment Nancy hopes to strengthen her business and increase sales so she can get ahead.

She aspires to having a broad range of merchandise and to be increasingly efficient when it comes to her customers, as well as improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy blouses, skirts, towels, lotions, make-up and other beauty products

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta D. accesorios para celulares, vive con su esposo y su hijo D. 4 años D. edad, residen en Jucuapa departamento D. Usulután,  este negocio D. María está ubicado en su propia casa, no tiene un horario fijo y para iniciarlo tomo un curso donD. aprendió la reparación D. los móviles. 
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. accesorios como baterías, estuches, tarjetas entre otros, esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar el negocio, atender más clientes y mejorar su vida cotidiana, las aspiraciones D. ella es tener un negocio fuerte, ofrecer a sus hijos un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
María, who sells mobile phone accessories, lives with her husband and 4-year-old son in Jucuapa in the department of Usulután.  María runs her business out of her own home and does not have fixed working hours.  Before setting up her activity she took a course in mobile phone repair.

She is requesting the loan to buy accessories such as batteries, cases, cards and other items.  This investment will help her improve her business, proviD. better service to customers and improve her family's lifestyle.

She aspires to making her business strong so she can proviD. a better future for her family.

loans.use: To buy mobile phone accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To stock up on more food products.

loans.name: Ana Delmi

texts.es:
Ana de 30 años de edad, reside en Puerto el Triunfo departamento de Usulután,  es soltera, vive con su madre, y se dedica a atender una librería y papelería, este negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa y no tiene un horario fijo para atenderlo.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar cuadernos, bolígrafos, resmas de papel, pastas, caratulas todo lo relacionado a papelería, esta inversión Ana desea hacerla para aumentar el inventario del negocio y poder ofrecer a los clientes variedad de materiales.
Ana se proyecta a futuro contar con una librería de gran tamaño, que atienda las necesidades de los clientes ofreciendo una amplia línea de materiales de lectura y material didáctico, de igual manera que sus ingresos sean mayores y mejore su condición de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is 30 years old and lives in Puerto el Triunfo in the department of Usulután.  She is single, lives with her mother, and has a bookstore and stationery supplies business that she runs out of her home.  She has no set opening hours.

She is requesting a loan to buy notebooks, ballpoint pens, paper, paste, and folders and anything related to her activity.  This investment will help Ana increase her stock and offer her customers a wider variety of materials.

Ana sees herself in the future with a large bookstore and being able to offer customers a wide array of reading and teaching materials.  She also hopes to increase her income and improve her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy notebooks, ballpoint pens, paper, paste, folders

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es:
Doña Rosa, reside en Nueva Guadalupe, departamento de San Miguel, tiene 59 años de edad, vive con su esposo y una hija de 18 años de edad, doña Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa, negocio que surge por iniciativa propia hace 22 años,  su actividad es comprar y vender prendas de vestir en un local ubicado en el mercado municipal de Jucuapa, su horario de venta es de 6:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería como: Blusas, Faldas, Uniformes escolares, Camisas, Ropa para niños, entre otros. Con esta inversión espera fortalecer el negocio, mejorar los ingresos para su familia, aumentar sus clientes.
Su aspiración es ser una gran comerciante, con un negocio fuerte, competente pero sobre todo un negocio donde los clientes encuentren lo que necesitan para vestir bien.
texts.en:
Doña Rosa lives in Nueva Guadalupe in the department of San Miguel.  She is 59 years old and lives with her husband and 18 year-old daughter.  Rosa began her business selling clothing 22 years ago.  She has a stall in the municipal market of Jucuapa and opens from 6:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise such as blouses, skirts, school uniforms, shirts and children's clothing.  With this investment she hopes to strengthen her business, increase her customer base and icrease income for her family.

She aspires to being an important merchant with a strong, competent business that can provide everything her customers need to be able to dress well.

loans.use: To buy blouses, skirts, school uniforms, shirts and children's clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Ana Simeona

texts.es:
Doña Ana, tiene 61 años, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, vive en compañía de su esposo y dos hijos de 18 y 15 años de edad.
Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 35 años, aprendió a elaborarlas cuando trabajo en un comedor, actualmente lo tiene ubicado en el mercado municipal, lo atiende de 5:00am a 6:00pm. Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de maíz, leña y gas, con la adquisición de estos materiales espera continuar con el negocio de una forma más solvente, con todo lo necesario para realizar sus ventas diarias.
Su principal aspiración es que el negocio cada vez crezca más, que le  produzca más ganancias para ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios y en un futuro contar con mejores condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
Doña Ana is 61 years old and lives in Jucuapa in the department of Usulután with her husband and two children, ages 18 and 15.  She has been selling tortillas for 35 years.  She learned how to make them when she worked in a diner.  She now has a stall in the municipal market and opens from 5:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  

She is requesting the loan to buy corn, firewood and gas.  With these materials she hopes to continue her business and make it more economically sound by having everything she needs for her daily sales.

Her main goal is to grow her business and increase earnings to help her children with their education and to have better living conditions in the future.

loans.use: To buy corn, firewood and gas

loans.name: Oscar Osmin

texts.es:
Oscar de 40 años de edad, es sastre, vive con sus hijas de 14 y 16 años de edad, residen en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, la casa que habitan es alquilada, ahí mismo posee el taller de sastrería, donde confecciona de toda clase de ropa, este oficio lo aprendió hace 18 años y hasta el momento ha sido su fuente de ingreso, no tiene un horario fijo para realizar los trabajos.
El actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar telas de diferentes colores y estilos, hilos, ciper, botones y broches, al realizar esta compra Oscar estará más seguro de su trabajo, pues al tener todo lo necesario para confeccionar ropa también podrá hacer los trabajos en menor tiempo y de calidad.
El aspira que después de la inversión el taller se vuelva fuerte en trabajos, con materiales nuevos para realizar los encargos, también quiere recibir mejores ganancias y que su familia cuente con una calidad de vida excelente.
texts.en:
Oscar, 40 years of age, is a tailor.  He lives with his daughters, ages 14 and 16, in the department of Jucuapa in Usulután.  The house they live in is rented, and it is there that he has the tailor’s shop where he makes all types of clothing.  He learned this trade 18 years ago and, to this day, it has been his source of income.  He does not have a fixed schedule in which to do his work.

He currently requests a loan to purchase fabric in different colors and styles, threads, zippers, buttons and clasps.  Upon buying these supplies, Oscar will be able to work more securely since, by having what he needs to make clothes, he will also be able to do his work in less time and higher quality.

He hopes that, after his investment, his workshop will be busy.  With new materials to fill orders, he also wants to increase his income so that his family can count on a higher standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase fabric in different colors and styles, threads, zippers, buttons and clasps.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase materials to build her stable.

loans.name: Elvia America

texts.es:
Elvia reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, tiene 32 años, su familia son su esposo y tres hijos de 2, 13 y 14 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de mercería, inicio este negocio hace 2 años, por iniciativa propia, está ubicado en su casa de habitación y lo atiende de 6:00am a 8:00pm.
Ella necesita un préstamo para comprar estuches para celulares, gorras, Dvd, CD, lentes de sol, pulseras, collares, reloj, pues estos productos son los que mayor demanda tienen en su negocio, por tal motivo desea abastecer el inventario y garantizar la posibilidad de continuar con sus ventas.
Ella aspira en lo personal, tener la capacidad para administrar bien el negocio, aumentar el volumen de mercadería para ofrecer a los clientes, alimentar su espíritu de comerciante para siempre ver  hacia el progreso y la rentabilidad, a parte del negocio también sueña con ver a sus hijas graduadas de la universidad y con nuevas expectativas.
texts.en:
Elvia lives in the department of Jucuapa in Usulután.  She is 32 years old, and her family includes her husband and 3 children ages 2, 13, and 14.  She sells miscellaneous goods, a business she started 2 years ago under her own initiative and that is located in her home.  She is open from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm.  

She needs a loan to buy cell phone cases, hats, DVDs, CDs, sunglasses, bracelets, necklaces and watches, as these are the products that are in most demand.  For this reason, she would like to supply her inventory and guarantee that her sales continue.

On the personal side, her wishes are to have the ability to manage her business well, augment the volume of merchandise she has to offer to customers, and feed her entrepreneurial spirit to always see progress and profitability.  In addition to her business aspirations, she would like to see her daughters graduate from the university and with new expectations.

loans.use: To purchase cell phone cases, hats, DVDs, CDs, sunglasses, bracelets, necklaces and watches.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase cedar lumber, adhesive, paint and nails.

loans.name: Blanca Celina

texts.es:
Doña Blanca, de 41 años de edad, reside en San Buena Ventura, departamento de Usulután, su negocio es una tienda, vive con su esposo y dos hijos 18, 4 años de edad. El negocio es una tienda la cuan atiende desde hace 9 años, todos los días de la semana ya que está instalada en su casa de habitación.
Ella actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprar aceite, pollo, embutidos bebidas, azúcar, jabón,  esta compra es muy necesaria para el negocio, pues esta mercadería es demandada por los clientes, lo cual doña Blanca debe tener siempre disponible para vender.
Doña Blanca aspira tener un negocio amplio, lleno de mercadería, clientes satisfechos por el buen servicio y una familia unida trabajando por progresar juntos.
texts.en:
Blanca, 41 years of age, lives in San Buena Ventura, department of Usulután.  Her business is a general store.  She lives with her husband and two children ages 18 and 4.  They have been tending to the store for the past 9 years every day of the week, as it is located in their own house.

She currently needs a loan to purchase cooking oil, chicken, cold cuts, beverages, sugar, soap, which are all very necessary for her business.  This type of merchandise is in high demand by customers, and Blanca must have them available to sell.

Blanca dreams of having a large business full of merchandise, customers satisfied by the excellent service, and a united family working together to get ahead.

loans.use: To purchase cooking oil, chicken, cold cuts, beverages, sugar, soap.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase construction materials to improve her stable and cuye farm.

loans.name: Maria Eusevia

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 46 años de edad, reside en Ozatlan, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo y dos hijas de 23 y 14 años de edad, tiene un negocio el cual atiende hace 15 años, ubicado en el centro escolar de Ozatlan, el horario es de 6:00am a 6:00pm.
Ella ofrece en su negocio comida rápida, boquitas, bebidas, galletas, dulces, a los estudiantes y maestros del centro escolar, pero ahora necesita del apoyo de un préstamo para surtir el negocio de toda la mercadería antes mencionada.
Con la inversión espera dar abasto a la demanda generada por los estudiantes y mejorar las condiciones del hogar dándoles a sus hijos los estudios necesarios para que se superen.
texts.en:
María, 46 years of age, lives in Ozatlan, department of Usulután.  She lives with her husband and two daughters ages 23 and 14.  She has a business she’s been tending to for 15 years, located in the center of the school district in Ozatlan.  The business hours are 6:00 am to 6:00 pm.

She offers fast food, snacks, beverages, cookies and candies to the students and teachers of the school district.  However, she now needs the support of a loan in order to supply her business with all of the aforementioned merchandise.

With this investment, she hopes to meet the demand generated by the students.  Also, she would like to improve the conditions of the home, and give her children the necessary education to be successful.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Reina Melany

texts.es:
Doña Reyna de 39 años de edad, reside en Chinameca departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y tiene tres hijos de 26, 24 y 16 años de edad, los dos mayores están fuera del hogar, pues ya se casaron y viven con su pareja. Doña Reyna atiende un comedor en el mercado municipal de Chinameca, lo inicio hace 10 años trabajando de lunes a domingo.
Ella actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en arroz, frijol, aceite, maíz, plátanos, tomates, condimentos, bebidas, esta compra le ayudara muchísimo al negocio y a su familia, ya que con toda esta mercadería estará aumentando la producción de alimentos y al mismo tiempo las ganancias.
Las aspiraciones de doña Reyna es seguir incrementando el negocio, también que su hijo pueda culminar sus estudios.
texts.en: Reyna is 39 years old and lives in Chinameca, a department of San Miguel.  She lives with her husband and has three children of ages 26, 24, and 16; the two eldest are out of the home and have since married and live with their partners.  Reyna tends to a dining hall at the municipal marketplace of Chinameca; she started 10 years ago working from Monday to Sunday.  She is requesting the loan to invest in: rice, beans, oil, corn, bananas, tomatoes, condiments, and beverages, a purchase that would greatly help her business and her family.   With all the merchandise, she would increase her food production and earnings alike.  Reyna aspires to continue growing the business and also for her son to complete his education.

loans.use: Purchase of: rice, beans, oil, corn, bananas, tomatoes, condiments, and beverages.

loans.name: Manuela De Jesus

texts.es:
Doña Manuela, tiene 57 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre y dos hermanas. El negocio de ella es la venta de tostadas, enchiladas y mariscos, este comenzó con el apoyo de su madre y hermanas, quienes hasta el momento le ayudan a atenderlo, no tiene un horario fijo de atención, pero cuenta con una larga experiencia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar materiales como plátanos, yuca, bolsas plásticas, ya que son los necesarios para atender a los clientes, esta inversión será una gran ayuda que le permitirá continuar trabajando y generando ingresos para su familia.
Doña manuela aspira mejorar la atención a la clientela, aumentando la producción y realizar los alimentos cada día mejor.
texts.en:
Manuela is 57 years old and she lives in El Transito, in the department of San Miguel. She lives with her mother and her two sisters. She sells tostadas, enchiladas, and seafood. She started out with the support of her mother and sisters who until now have been helping her run the business. She doesn't have a fixed work schedule and she has many years' experience.

She requests a loan to purchase ingredients such as bananas, yucca, and plastic bags. These are necessary to attend her clients. This investment will be a great help because it will permit her to keep working and generating an income for her family. 

Manuela aspires to provide her clientele with better service by increasing production and preparing her foods every day a little better.

loans.use: To purchase bananans, yucca, and plastic bags.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, tiene 39 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de medicina natural, vive con su familia conformada por: Sus padres y dos hermanos de 17 y 19 años de edad, él es soltero.
El negocio lo inicio con la ayuda de algunos amigos, hace algunos años, no tiene un horario fijo de venta porque visita varios lugares y varia su hora de regreso a casa. Él está solicitando un crédito  para  mejorar la vivienda, ya que tiene que hacerle algunas reparaciones.
Las aspiraciones de Tomas es que en el corto plazo pueda tener ganancias del negocio para continuar mejorando poco a poco la vivienda, ya que quiere que sus padres estén en un lugar más cómodo y amplio.
texts.en:
Tomas lives in Transito in the department of San Miguel. He is 39 years old and he sells homeopathic medicines. He lives with his family and is it made up of his parents and two brothers, 17 and 19 years of age. He is single. 

He started his business with the help of some friends a few years ago. He doesn't have a fixed work schedule because he travels to various locales and he comes back home at different hours of the day. He requests a loan to improve his house. It needs to have some repairs done. 

In the short term, Tomas aspires to earn an income from his business to progressively continue making improvements to their house. He wants to see his parents live in a place that is more comfortable and more spacious.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Neang

texts.en:
Neang K., 29, is married to Mr. Phan Srim, 28, a local farmer. They live in Kompong Cham province. Neang K. is talented at making bamboo baskets for the market. She also helps her husband farm and plant rice. She and her husband go through the village seeking bamboo. They then take the bamboo home, put it in water for almost a week and then dry it in the sunshine for at least three days. They split the bamboo into smaller pieces, which she and her husband use to make baskets.

Neang K. is now asking for a loan to help her breed pigs to provide the family with extra income. The loan money will be used to buy piglets and many sacks of pig feed.

loans.use: to buy piglets and pig feed

loans.name: Flory

texts.en:
Flory is a married woman who lives in Candoni, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating a sari-sari store and a sugarcane farming business. Her husband Ernesto, who is 50 years old, works as a farmer to earn his living and helps in his wife's business activities. They have six children who are between 14 and 27 years old. Flory joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2002 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past seven loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Flory has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 8,000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 3,000, uplifting the family's standard of living. This time, for her eighth loan, she is borrowing PHP 10,000 to use as additional funds for her business operations so that she can continue to save up for future family needs. Flory is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed upon a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by joining the NWTF Kiva lending team at http://www.kiva.org.

loans.use: To fund her business operations

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Gelyn

texts.en:
Gelyn A. is a 26-year-old married woman who supports her family by operating a Jeep transportation business and a general store.  She lives in Cauayan, Negros Occidental. She has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 2008 and has improved her living conditions with the help of her loans from NWTF and through her own efforts. By working hard in her Jeep and general store businesses, she is gradually making her family more economically stable. She now earns an average monthly income of 20,000. Gelyn is now borrowing PHP 29,000 for Jeep maintenance. This will be her fifth loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon. Her previous loan of 9,000, which she paid off well within its term, was just another step in her journey toward economic freedom. Gelyn aspires to elevate her family's living conditions and ensure their future wellbeing by following the Dungganon way.

Meriden is a married woman who lives in Candoni, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating four business ventures: buying and selling rice, buying & selling charcoal, a general store and a farming business. Her husband Rolando, who is 52 years old, works as a farmer to earn his living and helps in his wife's business activities. They have six children who are between 20 and 30 years old. Meriden joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2002 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 16 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Meriden has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 20,500 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 4,000, uplifting the family's standard of living.  This time, for her 17th loan, she is borrowing PHP 25,000 to purchase more stock to sell so that she can continue to save up for the future and for her child’s education. Meriden is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams.

loans.name: Sem

texts.en: Sem K., 26, resides with her family in Takeo Province, Cambodia, an area known for its pre-Angkorean temples. K. and her husband sell mats and pillows, earning an income of USD 3.30 each per day. Each month, the family has to spend USD 45 on food and USD 107 on other expenses. K. is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase more mats and pillows to improve the current business. In the future, she would like to use the additional income to repair her house. This will be her second loan from CREDIT, a long-standing Kiva partner.

loans.use: To buy more mats and pillows to resell.

loans.name: Ung

texts.en: Ung P., 43, resides with her family in Takeo Province, Cambodia, an area known for its pre-Angkorean temples. P. sells cow ties (ropes that are used like leashes to keep the animal in place), earning an income of USD 3.30 per day. Her husband is a construction worker, earning an income of USD 1.60 per day. Each month, the family has to spend USD 45 on food and USD 100 on other expenses. P. is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase a motorbike to transport the cow ties to where she can sell them. In the future, she would like to use the additional income to repair her house. This will be her second loan from CREDIT, a long-standing Kiva partner.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to transport cow ties for sale.

loans.name: Ke

texts.en: Ke T. is a 34-year-old married woman who lives in the province of Kompong Tom. She and her husband are both employed as local workers at the rubber plantation. The couple usually generates an average income of $7.50 per day for the family’s needs. They currently face a problem with their living conditions because their house is getting old and it isn't high enough off the ground. Ke T. is requesting a loan to raise the framework of the house and to buy fill to place under the house.

loans.use: to raise the framework of the house and to buy fill

loans.name: Sok

texts.en: Sok T., 28, is a professional tailor who resides with two young children and her husband in the province of Takeo. She has been tailoring since 2009 and is able to make about US$2 of profit each day. Her husband works in construction, typically making US$5 every day. Sok T. needs to take out a loan of US$600 to purchase a motorbike for her husband to commute to work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike.

loans.name: Sun
