Además como es una mujer emprendedora que tiene muchos planes en mente, para más adelante quiere comprar un motocarro más aparte del que tiene para  ampliar su negocio. 

Dolores tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra D. mayor cantidad D. materiales para producir varios juegos D. comedor (mesas y sillas), ya que tiene varios pedidos por cumplir, y así calcula que mejorara sus  ganancias.

Es el décimo crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que no quiere defraudar la confianza que depositaron en ella todas las personas que hicieron posible el dinero  que le permitirá continuar trabajando.
texts.en:
Dolores is 64 years old.  She lives in her own home together with her mother, her husband Edgar (60), her eldest son, her daughter-in-law and her granddaughter.  They are very close and live in a populous neighborhood in the north of the city.

For two years, this enterprising woman has been selling wooden furniture such as shelves, display cases and beds which are located outsiD. her home.  She says that she had the idea of starting this business since the area where she lives is very commercial which has allowed her to attract good customers over a short period of time.  Dolores really enjoys her work as she considers it relaxed and profitable.  Although she works alone in her business, she has help from her son and her daughter-in-law.  She is gradually increasing the range of furniture that she sells to her customers who visit her frequently owing to the good finish and quality of her merchandise.  As she is an enterprising woman who has many plans, in the future Dolores would like to buy an additional three-wheeler van in order to expand her business.

Dolores plans to invest the money she is requesting in purchasing a larger quantity of materials so that she can produce dining room sets (tables and chairs) since she has several orders to fill.  In this way, she calculates that she will improve her profits.

This is Dolores' 10th loan with MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time since she doesn't want to let down all the people who have placed their trust in her and maD. possible this money that will allow her to continue working.

loans.use: To buy materials

loans.name: Rabecca

texts.en: Rabecca is a forty-two-year-old single mother of five children living in her own house in Fort Portal, Uganda with a dream of educating her children up to university. For seven years she has been farming and with the proceeds she has been able to pay school fees for her children. She has challenges in price fluctuations and her desire is to become a commercial farmer. Rabecca needs the loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: Paying school fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.es:
Jimmy, de 32 años, vive en la casa de sus padres en compañía de ellos y de sus hermanos menores; juntos buscan progresar cada día.

Desde muy joven este trabajador hombre se dedica a la reparación de equipos electrónicos (televisores, computadoras, refrigeradoras, entre otros)  en su taller que esta ubicado en su vivienda. Su pasión por este oficio empezó cuando era pequeño pues observaba como sus tíos realizaban esta labor, y así mirando aprendió todas las técnicas necesarias. Le gusta mucho su trabajo pues empieza desde muy temprano y se prolonga hasta la noche, de lunes a viernes,  además el tiempo le ha permitido captar cantidad de clientes que lo buscan por la calidad y confianza del trabajo que desempeña. También paralelamente a esta labor, desde hace cuatro años,  durante los fines de semana se desempeña como sonidista para una empresa que presta el servicio de sonidos y luces, por lo que no tiene descanso, pero tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de instalar su propia empresa de servicio de sonido. 

Jimmy tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de materiales (lentes ópticos, zoom, celulares, entre otros) que necesita para mejorar su trabajo, pues quiere comprar en cantidad para no ir tantas veces a la ciudad donde los venden pues esta algo alejada.

Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso.
texts.en:
Jimmy is 32 years old and lives in his parents' home with his parents and his younger siblings.  Together they all seek to make progress every day.

Since he was very young, this hard-working man has been repairing electronic equipment (television sets, computers, refrigerators, etc.) in his workshop which is located in his home.  His passion for this trade started when he was small as he used to watch his uncles carrying out this work.  He learned all the skills he needed from watching them.  Jimmy really enjoys his work.  He starts work very early in the morning and keeps going until evening, from Monday to Friday.  Over time, he has attracted a large number of customers who seek him out for the quality of his work and the confidence that they have in his work.  In addition to this work, for four years he has also worked as a sound engineer for a company that provides sound and light services.  He does not rest.  However, he has a lot of plans for the future such as setting up his own company offering sound services.

Jimmy plans to invest the money he is requesting in purchasing materials (optical lenses, zoom lenses, cell phones, etc.) that he needs to improve his business since he would like to buy in bulk so that he doesn't have to travel to the city so often to buy his products - it is quite a long way.

This is the first loan that Jimmy has had with MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time since he doesn't want to let down the people who have made this money possible as it will allow him to continue working in search of progress.

loans.use: To buy optical lenses, zoom lenses, cell phones, etc.

loans.name: Benkan (Entente) Group

texts.fr:
Benkan est un regroupement de femmes  du quartier N’Tonasso de la ville de Koutiala qui se connaissent bien et vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 40 ans, sont mariées et mères d’au moins 5 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait essentiellement le commerce de condiments alimentaires de toutes sortes : oignons, tomate, épices, des choux,  poivron, carottes, haricot vert, radis etc, à l’image de Kadiatou Sangaré. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso il y a 1 an. Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt de groupe et  le prêt précédent  a été bien remboursé. .  
Kadiatou compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, des sacs d’oignon, de choux des paniers de tomate et beaucoup d’épices. Elle se procure  de ces condiments dans les différents villages auprès des jardiniers. Elle  les revend  en détail et au comptant au grand marché de Koutiala à une clientèle diverse et variée. 
Tandis que Les membres du groupe Benkan comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 110 000FCFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Kadiatou Sangaré compte réaliser 120 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses courantes de la famille.
texts.en:
Benkan is a group of women from the N’Tonasso district of Koutiala City. They know one another well and live in large traditional families with their husbands, children, and parents. The women of the group average 40 years of age and are married mothers of at least five children. This group of women essentially does commerce in all sorts of condiments: onions, tomatoes, spices, cabbage, peppers, carrots, green beans, radishes, etc., as does Ms. Kadiatou Sangaré. 

To increase the size of their businesses, the group members decided to join the loan program of the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso about a year ago. They are now on their second group loan. The preceding one has been repaid. 

Kadiatou intends to use her loan to buy sacks of onions and cabbages, baskets of tomatoes, and many spices. She acquires these condiments in the various villages from gardeners. Accepting cash, she sells them retail to a diverse and varied customer base at the main market of Koutiala. 

While the other group members plan on making an average profit of 110,000 francs CFA in the course of the loan cycle, Kadiatou plans on making 120,000 francs. In addition to repaying the loan, the group members will use a portion of the revenues for coping with typical family expenses.

loans.use: Buying condiments

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
José, de 35 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su madre, su hijo pequeño y su pareja, juntos buscan progresar cada día. 

Desde hace tres años, este emprendedor hombre se dedica a la producción de prendas de vestir (como polos, pantalones cortos y otros de tela) en el taller que administra  al lado de su pareja; ahí trabaja su conyugue al lado de un ayudante. Esta muy satisfecho pues el negocio es muy productivo ya que la producción en prendas de vestir aumentó en los últimos tiempos; pero lo único que lo ha detenido en su negocio es que no tiene un local de material noble donde desempeñarse con tranquilidad  y con frecuencia debió trasladarse de un lugar a otro. Como es un hombre emprendedor tiene planeado en el futuro ampliar su taller y comprar mas maquinas de coser para contratar mas personas, con el objetivo de comercializar en mayor cantidad y obtener mejores ganancias.

José tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de materiales de construcción que le hacen falta para terminar el taller que con mucho esfuerzo esta acabando de edificar. 

Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso.
texts.en:
35-year old José lives in his own home with his mother, young son, and his wife. Together they work hard to make progress on a daily basis. For the last three years, this enterprising man has earned a living making clothing such as polo shirts, shorts etc. in the workshop he and his wife run with the help of an assistant.

José is very content as his business is doing well and production increased in the last few months. The only thing holding him back is that he doesn’t own even a simple stall where he can do his job in peace and quiet so he has to move frequently from place to place.

As José is an enterprising person, he is making plans for the future. He wants to expand his workshop and buy more sewing machines so that he can employ more people, sell more products, and earn more money. He is planning to use the loan to buy the construction materials he needs to complete the workshop he is working hard to build.

loans.use: construction material

loans.name: Baloon Group

texts.en:
Khalid S., who is in his mid-forties, is married with two children.  He sells fish at Afrikan, a place just outside the city centre. He works from 6:00am to 9:00pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Khalid's sixth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to increase his stock of fish, and he bought a plot of land and has paid back his loan successfully.  He wants to use this loan to make some bricks to develope his land which he bought in his last loan. His dream is to further increase his stock of fish.

Khalid will share this loan with his loan group "Baloon", which has a total of 18 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

In the picture, Khalid is in front wearing a dark blue T-shirt, second from left.

loans.use: To make some bricks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Jose Pablo

texts.es:
Jose de 53 años, es un comerciante de verduras que con esfuerzo y dedicación a tenido buenos ingresos. Desde pequeño el aprendió a vender verduras, poco a poco fue apuntando a este negocio para que sea su medio de ingresos económicos. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio ya que vende las verduras en un mercado. Trabaja muy temprano para tener todo el orden y que sus clientes se sientan a gusto al comprar las verduras. Se levanta a las 04h00am madrugada y termina su trabajo a las 14h00pm. Con el préstamo quiere comprar verduras para tener mejores ventas.
texts.en:
Jose, 53, is a vegetable vendor who, through effort and dedication, has made a nice income.  From the time he was small, he learned the vegetable business, and little by little set his sights on it so he could make it his living.  

Jose sells at the market and has high aspirations for his business.  He starts work very early so he can get everything in order and his clients can feel good about buying the vegetables.  He gets up at 4AM and quits at 2PM.  He plans to use his loan to buy vegetables so he can increase sales.

loans.use: To buy vegetables.

loans.name: Aura Del Carmen

texts.es: Aura Del Carmen, se dedica a la actividad económica de mercadería en general. Hace mas de 3 años que inicio este medio de vida, pues desde hace mucho tiempo en su familia le enseñaron a trabajar muy duro. Ella dio inicio porque tenía que sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos menores de edad, por lo que siempre le ha gustado el comercio. Aura tiene que levantarse temprano para preparar su bolso y empezar a ofrecer cada uno de sus productos. Este crédito es para la compra de calzado, cosméticos, perfumes entre otros.
texts.en: Aura del Carmen earns her living selling merchandise in general.  She started out more than three years ago.  Her family spent quite a long time teaching her to work hard.  She started the business because she had always liked it, and she needed to support her two young children.  She has to get up early to get her bag together and start offering each one of her products.  She plans to use her loan to buy shoes, cosmetics, perfumes, etc.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Theogene

texts.fr: Theogene B. est journaliste de la radio locale en ville de Kigali, il est né au Rwanda. Il a 42 ans et est célibataire. Il un diplôme de niveau humaniste en lettre. Il est client d’ACB depuis 2010. Il besoin d’un prêt pour l’ordinateur portable (laptop) pour utiliser dans sa carrière de journalisme, ses ambitions sont de travailler à la hâte pour augmenter sa professionnalisme,  sa stratégie pour a croissance de l’affaires et d’augmenter pouvoir rédiger les informations de façon facile, enfin il veut chercher construire sa maison et pouvoir se marier.
texts.en: Theogene B. is a journalist working at the local radio station of the town of Kigali. He was born in Rwanda. He is 42 years old and single. He has a college degree in liberal arts. He has been a client of ACB since 2010. He needs a loan in order to purchase a laptop computer for his journalistic work. His goals are to work hard to grow professionally, and his strategy is to be able to  draft his documents easily. Finally, he would like to be able to build a house and get married.

loans.use: Purchasing a laptop

loans.name: Juana Mercedes

texts.es: Juana Mercedes tiene 41 años, a esta edad ella ha aprendido a luchar a mantener activo su negocio. Su actividad económica es una pulpería, hace más de 5 años que se dedica a este negocio y está ubicado en su vivienda por lo que tiene 3 hijos a su cargo. Poco a poco Juana ha ido creciendo con su negocio, a pesar de las dificultades como brindar el espacio suficiente para colocar sus productos en su vivienda. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos naturales, detergentes y pan. Su deseo es incrementar su capital de trabajo para mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Juana Mercedes is 41 years old.  At this age she has learned to fight to keep her business active.  Her business activity is a grocery store, which she has had for over five years.  It is located in her home because she has three children under her care.

Little by little Juana has been making her business grow.  She does this in spite of the difficulties like finding sufficient space to place her products in her home.

The loan she is requesting is for work capital to buy basic grains, sweets, natural soft drinks, detergents, and bread.  Her wish is to increase her work capital in order to improve her earnings.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Eliza

texts.es: Eliza D. 61años, es viuda y vive con una D. sus hijas y sus 2 nietos en su casa propia. Casi toda su vida se ha dedicado a la siembra y cosecha D. papa y maíz, principalmente, ya que estos productos son comercializados en la ciudad más cercana a su zona. La ventas que realiza son al por mayor y menor, D. acuerdo a las oportunidades que se le presenten, D. esta manera tiene los recursos que necesita. Paralelamente a esto cría pollos y ovejas en su granja, es así que su tiempo lo ocupa en la ganadería; pero los fines D. semana los venD., siendo la venta D. pollos que más se realiza. Su entrega al trabajo es lo que la caracteriza, por ello espera intensificarse en la agricultura. Es su  tercer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta D.  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso D. su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita le servirá para comprar sacos D. abono.
texts.en:
Eliza, 61, is a widow living with one of her daughters and two grandchildren in her own house.  She has been primarily a potato and corn farmer most of her life since these products are sold in the city nearest her zone.  The sales she does are wholesale and retail according to the opportunities that present themselves; this is how she earns the resources she needs.  At the same time, she also raises chickens and sheep at her farm so her time is used to raise livestock.  She sells them on the weekend and what she sells the most is chickens.  She is noted for her devotion to work and because of this she hopes to intensify the farming.

This is her 3rd loan with MFP and she’s very happy to know she has financial support since she has always been very responsible with her payments.  Besides, she enjoys being part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible, mutually supportive people.  She thanks all those who will fund the loan she’s asking for that will be very useful for her business’ progress.  

She will use the loan to buy sacks of manure.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Carmen Sonia

texts.es:
Carmen de 45 años, comenzó a generar dinero vendiendo productos Yanbal. Poco a poco empezó a compara viveres para vender en un local. En la actualidad por la buena administración que le dio ahora tiene su propia tienda. 

En la actualidad vende arroz, azúcar, aceite etc. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere seguir trabajando con muchos víveres. Para continuar con su negocio ella quiere el préstamo para comprar arroz, aceite, azúcar.
texts.en:
Carmen, 45 years old, began earning money selling Yanbal products. Little by little, she began to purchase supplies to sell at a site. Now, because of her good management skills, she has her own store. 

Currently she sells rice, sugar, oil, etc. She has many aspirations for her business, and for this reason, she wants to keep working with various goods. To continue her business, she requests a loan to purchase rice, oil and sugar.

loans.use: Rice, oil, sugar

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz, de 45 años, vive en su casa que es propia, en compañía de sus padres y de sus hijos que ya son jóvenes.

Recuerda como empezó en la venta de productos de belleza de una reconocida marca, desde entonces ya  han pasado 3 años. En la actualidad no solo comercializa su mercadería, si no también capta nuevas vendedoras lo que le permite obtener buenos incentivos y ganancias de la empresa para la que trabaja.  Además esta muy satisfecha pues el trabajo es muy tranquilo y lo puede realizar en la comodidad de su casa, donde ha instalado una vitrina y ahí muestra los productos que tiene en stock, entre cosméticos, perfumes y accesorios trata de colocar toda su mercadería a buen precio. Y desde hace algún tiempo una hermana le envía de la Argentina accesorios de todo tipo que han causado novedad entre sus clientes, y tiene mejores ganancias.  Además como es una dama muy emprendedora para más adelante tiene planeado surtir su otra  vitrina de productos y accesorios  pues con frecuencia sus clientes se acercan en cualquier momento a comprar, ya que necesitan para regalos ocasionales.

Luz tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería en productos de belleza, pues desea surtir mejor su otra  vitrina, y de esta manera espera ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.

Es el décimo  crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues  no quiere quedar mal con todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando.
texts.en:
Luz, 45 years old, lives in her own home, with her parents and her young children.

She began selling a well-known brand of beauty products three years ago. Now she not only sells products, but recruits new sales people, which allows her to earn incentives and increased earnings from the company she works for. She is very satisfied with her job, it is peaceful and she can work from the comfort of her own home, where she has installed a display case in which she can showcase the products she has in stock, including cosmetics, perfumes, and accessories. Her products are reasonably priced. 
Some time ago her sister sent her a variety of accessories from Argentina, which are a novelty for her customers and increase her earnings. In addition, as an enterprising woman, she is planning an additional display case for more products and accessories. Her customers visit often on the spur of the moment to purchase products, sometimes as gifts.

Luz plans to invest the money she's requested in purchasing more merchandise, to stock her other display case and hopefully to offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

This is Luz's 10th loan with MFP, and she has agreed to make her repayments on time, as she does not want to look bad in front of all of the people who have made these loans to her business possible.

loans.use: Beauty products

loans.name: Poala Maria

texts.es:
Paola Chávez hace 6 meses puso un local donde la mama y vende camisas, vestidos, blusas etc. Trabaja ella sola desde las 8:00am hasta las 18:00 pm. 

Unas de sus obstáculos es la delincuencia en el sector. Es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos (7, 6, 1) y estudian en escuela fiscal. Con el préstamo va a comprar camisas, perfumes y juguetes. Unos de sus sueños para los próximos 5 años es tener un bazar más grande y que satisfaga a las necesidades de los clientes
texts.en:
Six months ago, Paola Chávez started a business selling t-shirts, dresses, blouses, etc. She works on her own from 8am to 6pm. 

One of the obstacles to her business is crime in the area. She is a single mother and has children (7, 6 and 1), who study at the public school. With this loan she will purchase t-shirts, perfumes and toys. One of her dreams is to have a larger business within the next 5 years, and to meet her customers' needs.

loans.use: Shirts, perfumes, and toys

loans.name: María Tempora

texts.es:
María tiene 34 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a su familia en el caserío Carrasquillo del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos diversos productos de consumo diario entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. En el negocio varios años y actualmente cuenta con una clientela fija y fidelizada. Gracias a esta actividad ella junto a su esposo ha podido mantener a su familia y sacarla adelante durante todo este tiempo.

María desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

María es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora su anhelo es tener una tienda mayorista en la zona mejorando de esta manera la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María, 34, is married living with her family in Carrasquillo hamlet which is in the Tambogrande agricultural district, an agricultural zone located in Piura region over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region’s capital.

She has a general store in her house where she sells her neighbors varied daily use items and groceries.  She’s been in business several years now and has an established base of regular customers.  Thanks to this activity she and her husband have been able to support the family during all this time.

María wants to expand the business buying more merchandise to meet customer demand.  She has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan.

María is a responsible, hard working woman whose dream is to have a wholesale store in the area thus improving her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Utamaduni Group

texts.en:
Mtumwa R. is 43 years old. She is a widowed with three children, a son and two daughters, all grown up and married. She has been selling clothes since 1992. She always works from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm. She buys her clothes from Kariakoo market and sells them in the neighbourhood.

This will be Mtumwa's fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She repaid her three previous loans successfully and she used them to increase stock in order for her business to grow. She wishes to use the current loan to buy more stock so she can increase her profit which will enable her to finish the family house she is building.

Mtumwa will share this loan with other members of "Utamaduni" group, seventeen in total. The members will hold each other accountable in repaying the loan. In the photo, Mtumwa can be seen in the back row, first on the left.

loans.use: To increase working capital

loans.name: Dennis Christian

texts.es:
Dennis Christian Z. V. tiene 32 años,  vive en el Departamento de Santa Cruz, es soltero no tiene hijos, trabaja desde hace 6 años en el Banco Union, tiene muchos sueños de superación, vive con su tia, desde que estuvo en la Universidad se pago sus estudios solo, asi logro con el tiempo obtener su titulo, cuando estudiaba ya trabajaba, estudio siempre en la Universidad estatal.

Dennis es una persona muy responsable que ahora ha logrado ahorrar un dinerito y desea invertir en algo importante y se le ha presentado una oportunidad para realizar estudios superiores, pero los costos para este tipo de estudios son muy altos por ello accedió a un plan de pagos donde le piden una cuota inicial que si le conviene por este motivo es que solicita un crédito para pagar un parte de la cuota inicial y con sus ahorros podrá pagar el saldo requerido, con el fin de adquirir mas conocimiento a nivel profesional.
 
Dennis espera con muchas ansias lograr sus metas de superación, con el tiempo poder ejercer sin inconvenientes su profesión.
texts.en:
Dennis Christian Z. V., 32, lives in Santa Cruz department.  He’s single and has no children.  He’s worked for the last 6 years at Unión Bank.  His dream is of self-improvement.  He lives with his aunt.  He’s paid for his university studies himself.  This is how he obtained his degree.  When he was studying he was already working.  He always went to the state university.

Dennis is a very responsible person who has now managed to save up a little money.  He wants to invest in something worthwhile and he’s been presented with an opportunity for higher education but the costs of this type of studies are very high.  He agreed to a payment plan where he is required to pay an initial down payment.  He feels that it would suit his purpose so is asking for a loan to pay part of this initial payment; he will use his savings to cover the rest of it.  His aim with this is to acquire advanced professional knowledge.

Dennis is very anxious to reach his self-improvement goals in order to practice his profession in time problem-free.

loans.use: To pay higher education expenses.

loans.name: Jackeline

texts.es: Jackeline es una mujer emprendedora de  36 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace varios años vende granos como maíz, cebada, arveja, habas y quinua, productos que siembra, y algunos son comprados de sus vecinos. Asimismo posee vacas, en donde vende la leche que extrae, así se genera un poco más de ganancia. Desde entonces viene realizando este trabajo desde hace más de 3 años, siendo los miércoles y fines de semana lo días de mayor venta. Procura siempre estar al pendiente de los precios que ofrece la competencia, para asegurar las ventas. Para ella este trabajo es imprescindible para poder sostener a su familia, por ello espera producir en mayor escala y convertirse en una comerciante mayorista. Es su tercer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá comprar sacos de abono para esta temporada de siembra que en la actualidad esta desarrollando.
texts.en: Jackeline is an enterprising woman of 36 years of age. She lives with her husband and 2 children in their own house. For the past several years she has been selling grains, such as corn, barley, peas, beans, quinoa, and harvest products, sometimes purchased by the neighbors. She also owns dairy cows that produce milk to generate an extra income. She has had this business for three years. The days when she sees the highest sales are on Wednesdays and on the weekends.  She tries to always know the prices by the competition to secure her sales. This work is essential to support her family and that’s why she hopes to produce at a greater rate and to become a wholesaler. This is her third loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is very happy to know she has this source of financial support. She has always demonstrated to be responsible with her payments and she also enjoys partaking in her communal bank because all of the other members are responsible and very caring people. She is thankful to all those individuals who will contribute to the loan she requests. It will be very useful for the progress of her business. With the help of the loan she requests she will be able to purchase sacks of fertilizers for the sowing season that is currently taking place.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Segakuca

texts.fr: Segakuca M. est éleveur des bovins et poules, il est né au Congo. Il a 50 ans et est marié, il 9 enfants entre 30 et 4 ans, 7 de ses enfants vont  à l’école. Il a un diplôme d’A0 en Agronomie. Il est client d’ACB depuis 2010. Il a besoin d’un prêt pour acheter une vache et des poules pour augmenter son élevage, ses ambitions sont de travailler à la hâte pour augmenter sa capacité financière, et la production des ses bêtes, sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaires et d’augmenter le terrain à cultiver car il fait aussi l’agriculture des légumineuses et graminées, enfin il veut rehabiliter sa maison.
texts.en: Segakuca M. raises  cattle and poultry. He is born in Congo. He is 50 years old and married. He has nine children between 30 and four years of age. Seven of his children are in school. He has an “A0” level diploma [roughly corresponding to junior college] in agronomy. He is a client of ACB since 1010. He needs a loan in order to purchase one cow and some chickens in order to increase his business. His goal is to work hard to increase his financial capacity and raise more livestock. His strategy is to increase also his field as he is also a farmer and grows vegetables and grasses. Finally, he wants to renovate his home.

loans.use: Purchasing a cow and chickens

loans.name: Ventura Del C

texts.es: Ventura De Jesús tiene 62 años, su actividad económica es brindar el servicio de costura, este no es el primer financiamiento que solicita, pues han sido muy beneficiosos para su negocio. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo que será utilizado para la compra de botones, telas, agujas, hilos entre otros productos. Ella quiere aprovechar esta temporada que es cuando los niños entran a clases y es la mejor oportunidad para realizar pedidos que ya le han encargo es por eso que solicita este financiamiento para la compra de materia prima. Su deseo es seguir con vida para continuar con este humilde trabajo.
texts.en:
Ventura De Jesús, 62, is a seamstress.  This isn’t her first loan request because they have been very beneficial for her business.  The loan she’s asking for is for working capital to buy buttons, fabric, needles and thread, among other supplies.  

She wants to take advantage of this season which is when children return to school and is the best opportunity to fill orders she’s already received.  
She asks for the loan, therefore, to acquire raw materials.  

Her wish is to continue living in order to continue with this humble occupation.

loans.use: To buy buttons, fabric, needles and threat, among other supplies.

loans.name: Maribel Esperanza

texts.es:
Doña Maribel, tiene 60 años de edad, reside en Concepción Batres, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo solamente, pues sus hijos ya están fuera del hogar formando sus propias familias,  doña Maribel posee una tienda donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad a los vecinos y amigos cercanos, este negocio lo aprendió desde joven y hoy día lo administra junto con su esposo en un horario de 6:00am a 6:00pm. 
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para la tienda, ya que esta comprar la necesita para abastecer el inventario de productos de mucha demanda como aceite para cocinas, pollo, pan, condimentos, bebidas, pues estos anteriores se utilizan a diario en los hogares.  Con esta inversión quiere agradar a los clientes, ampliando la línea de productos logrando así satisfacer las necesidades de estos.
Doña Maribel tiene por objetivo tener un negocio fuerte, rentable, con muchos clientes y estabilizar los ingresos para vivir cómodamente con su esposo.
texts.en:
Maribel is 60 years old and she lives in Concepcion Batres in the department of Usulutan. She lives alone with her husband because her children are grown and they have formed families of their own. Maribel has a general store, selling basic needs products to her neighbors and to her close friends. She learned this business when she was young and today she manages the business together with her husband, from 6am to 6pm. 

She requests a loan to purchase merchandise for her store. She needs this purchase to supplement her inventory especially for the products that are in high demand, such as cooking oil, poultry meat, bread, condiments, and drinks. These products are used on a daily basis in the home. With this investment she wants to satisfy her clients. She also wants to add to the line of products that she offers to better satisfy the needs of her clients.

Maribel’s objective is to have a strong business that is profitable and that is supported by many clients. She hopes to stabilize her income to live comfortably with her husband.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio, de 22 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de su pareja Mayra (19); a pesar de su juventud busca progresar cada día. 

Cuando era muy pequeño observaba a su abuela que atendía en su panadería, y con el pasar de los años cuando empezó a trabajar no dudo en instalar un sala de  panadería en su casa, desde entonces tiene dos  ayudantes que preparan toda clase de panes. Y luego comercializa su mercadería a los panaderos ambulantes de la zona; le gusta mucho el negocio porque es rentable ya que le permite ahorrar y pagarles a sus trabajadores. Además paralelamente a la administración de su panadería, se desempeña como albañil y trabaja por horas en diversas obras de construcción; a pesar de su juventud tiene grandes planes para el futuro como por ejemplo estudiar educación, además de instalar  una panadería estable, donde pueda vender en un lugar fijo, sin necesidad de desplazarse. 

Julio tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de ingredientes (harina, huevos, manteca, entre otros) al por mayor que necesita para continuar preparando sus panes y pastelillos pues dice que se acerca la época escolar y tiene bastante salida. 

Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso.
texts.en:
Julio, 22, lives in his own house alongside his life partner, Mayra, 19.  Despite his youth, he strives to progress daily.

When he was little he watched his grandmother run her bakery.  As years went by and he started to work he didn’t hesitate to set up a bakery in his house.  Since then, he has two assistants that prepare all kinds of bread.  He sells his merchandise to area bread peddlers.  He enjoys his business very much because it’s profitable, allowing him to save and pay his workers.  In addition to running his bakery, he also works as a bricklayer working hourly at various construction projects.  Despite his youth, he has great plans for the future.  For example, to study Education and set up a stable bakery where he can sell from a fixed locale and not have to travel around.

Julio plans to use the requested funds to buy ingredients (flour, eggs and lard, among others) at wholesale that he needs to continue making bread and pastries since the new school term is approaching and sales increase quite a bit.

This is his 3rd loan with MFP and he promises to pay his installments punctually because he does not want to disappoint the people who made the money possible that will allow him to stay in business in search of progress.

loans.use: For flour, eggs and lard, among others.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, mujer trabajadora de 56 años, vive en compañía de su hija en su casa propia. Desde muy niña se ha dedicado a las tareas agrícolas, desde entonces se ha convertido en su fuente de ingresos, es así que hasta la actualidad siembra, en sus tierras de cultivo que heredó de sus padres, los diversos productos de su zona como papa, maíz, trigo arveja, cebolla entre otras más que  luego de  pasar por el tiempo de su cosecha los vende al por mayor o lo lleva ella misma al mercado. Siempre ve lo que es más conveniente para ella, además su hija es la que siempre le ayuda en calcular las ganancias y en todo lo que se requiera para la siembra y la cosecha, también la apoya en el contrato a los peones para los trabajos que requieren de esfuerzo físico. Por otro lado también cría animales que compra y vende todos los fines de semana en la feria ganadera de su localidad, como: toros, ovejas y cerdos que tiene, cuyas ganancias le ayuda con el sustenta mientras espera la cosecha. Gloria quiere aumentar la cantidad de animales que tiene para que su capital sea mayor. Es su  tercer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá comprar un toro y varias ovejas.
texts.en:
Gloria, 56, is a hard working woman.  She lives with her daughter in her own house.  Since childhood she’s been involved in agricultural activities.  Forty years ago she decided that this would be the best way to earn a living.  To date, therefore, she farms the fields that were passed town to her from her parents.  The usual products are: potato, corn, wheat, peas and onions, among many others; once harvested they are sold at wholesale or she herself takes them to market.  She always does whatever's most convenient for her.  Her daughter helps her calculate profits and everything needed for planting and harvesting.  She also helps her hire day laborers for the tasks that require physical effort.  On the other hand, she also raises livestock, like bulls, sheep and pigs that she buys and sells weekends at her local livestock fair.  Profits from these sales support her while she’s waiting for the harvest. Gloria wants to increase the number of animals she has so that her capital will be larger.

This is her 3rd loan with MFP.  She is very happy knowing she has financial support for she has always been responsible with her payments.  Besides, she enjoys being part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible, mutually supportive people.  She thanks all those people who will fund the loan she’s requesting that will be so useful for her business’ progress.  She will use the requested loan to buy a bull and several sheep.

loans.use: To buy a bull and some sheep.

loans.name: Nelson Heriberto

texts.es:
Nelson, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y su hijo de dos años de edad, Nelson se dedica a la venta de ropa y hamacas, comenzó con el negocio gracias a unos amigos, el horario de atención es variado pues como el negocio es  propio lo atiende a toda hora.
Por el momento solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería, ya que desea mejorar el movimiento de las ventas, espera que con la inversión se pueda lograr, e ir incrementando poco a poco las ganancias y la clientela. Él sueña con ampliar el negocio, atender mejor a los clientes ofreciéndoles buena mercadería, ropa al gusto y de moda, al igual que las hamaca, pues los clientes son la razón de ser de este negocio y de su situación económica actual.
texts.en:
Nelson lives in San Rafael Oriente in the department of San Miguel. He lives with his wife and two-year old son. Nelson sells clothing and hammocks. He started the business with some friends. He has a varied work schedule because it is his own business and he is always attending it. 

He requests a loan to purchase merchandise in order to improve his sales. He hopes that this investment he will be able to progressively increase his earnings and his clientele. He dreams of expanding his business and to better attend his clients, offering them good quality merchandise and clothing to suit personal tastes and styles. He hopes to do the same with the hammocks. His clients are the reason for the existence of his business and the success of his current financial situation.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for his business.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Mshikamano Tegeta Group

texts.en:
Julius N., who is in his mid-thirties, is married with twin sons. He has had a business selling wood for three years now.  He works from 7:30am to 6:00pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Julius's 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy more wood and has paid back the loans successfully.  He hopes for a loan to buy a motorcycle. His dream is to buy a good stock of wood.

Julius will share this loan with his loan group "Mshikamano Tegeta" which has a total of 15 members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

In the photo Julius is in front with a cap, second from right.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Vilma De Jesus

texts.es: Vilma De Jesús tiene 42 años, por lo que su actividad económica es la venta de granos básicos. Hace más de 9 años que se dedica a este negocio. Ella ofrece una variedad de granos. Es una persona muy alegre y trabajadora por lo que vive muy feliz con su negocio a pesar de ganar mucho con este negocio le proporciona lo necesario para mantenerse a ella y la familia. Ella solicita urgentemente para comprar frijoles, azúcar, aceite, arroz, concentrado maíz entre otros. Su deseo es mantener siempre su record crediticio porque sin él no podría avanzar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Vilma De Jesús, 42, sells basic grains.  She’s been in business for over 9 years.  She offers a variety of grains.  She is a very cheerful, hard working person who lives happy with her business.  Despite not earning much with the business it provides the basics for her and her family’s support.
She urgently needs to buy beans, sugar, oil, rice, concentrate and corn, among other.  Her wish is to always maintain her credit history because without it she’d be unable to progress with her business.

loans.use: To buy beans, sugar, oil, rice, concentrate and corn, among others.

loans.name: Maria Fatima

texts.es:
María tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres en el caserío Pasabar Oleoducto a 30 minutos del distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola bastante comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra situada a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, caprino, aves de corral y cerdos, los cuales cría en un ambiente posterior a su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. Esta actividad la realiza hace tres años. Adicionalmente trabaja como profesora en el colegio inicial de su caserío y apoya el programa de la alfabetización de su caserío. Con los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia.

María desea ampliar su negocio comprando más animales y alimento balanceado de modo que pueda aumentar sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
María, 23, is single living with her parents in Pasabar Oleoducto Hamlet located thirty minutes from Olmos district, a quite commercial agricultural zone belonging to Lambayeque province located over an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

She raises sheep, goats, pigs and barnyard fowl in her back yard.  When they reach a good level of development she sells them to the general public and to merchants who visit her area.   She’s been in this occupation three years.  In addition she also works as a Teacher at her local elementary school and supports her hamlet’s literacy program.  Income from these activities helps support her family.

María wants to expand the business buying more animals and nutritionally balanced feed so that her sales will increase.  She has, therefore, deemed it advisable to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan.

loans.use: To buy livestock and nutritionally balanced feed.

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es:
Brígida, de 52 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de sus tres hijos; de los cuales solo se hace cargo de la menor, pues lo mayores trabajan, pero juntos buscan progresar cada día. 

Esta emprendedora mujer trabaja brindando el servicio de fotocopiadora e impresiones en un instituto de la zona norte de la ciudad. Dice que le gusta mucho su negocio, pues aunque es una profesora retirada de su labor encontró en este trabajo una manera de generarse buenos recursos y además tiene mucha paciencia con los jóvenes que muchas veces abarrotan su kiosco, pero ella los atiende con mucha amabilidad. Y hace algún tiempo implementó mejor su negocio con golosinas y gaseosas, pues se dio cuenta que era lo que necesitaban los alumnos del instituto, y le ha ido súper bien. Tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de instalar una tienda de venta de  equipos de sonido, pues se ha enterado que tienen bastante acogida por la zona donde vive, además su hijo mayor que es comerciante le dio esa buena idea. 

Brígida tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en llevar su fotocopiadora para que un técnico le realice  mantenimiento, pues ha presentado algunas fallas que hacen que demore en la buena atención a sus clientes.

Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso.
texts.en:
Brígida, 52, lives in her own house with her three children.  Only the youngest is still dependent on her since the older ones work.  However, they seek progress daily together.

This enterprising woman works providing photocopying and printing services at an school in the north part of the city.  She says she enjoys her work very much because, being a retired teacher, she found this job as a way to generate good income.  She also has a lot of patience with the youngsters who sometimes rowdily crowd into her kiosk; she takes care of them kindly anyway.  Some time ago she also stocked her business with snacks and soft drinks because she noticed that was what the students of the institute were lacking.  She has done super well.  She has a lot of plans for the future like opening a sound equipment store because she’s learned that it would be very well received in the area where she lives; besides her oldest son is a merchant and he gave her this good idea.

Brígida plans to use the requested funds to take her photocopier to a technician for service because it’s experiencing some problems that cause her to delay being able to provide good customer service.

This is her first loan with MFP and she promises to pay her installments punctually because she does not want to disappoint the people who made the money possible that will allow her to stay in business in search of progress.

loans.use: To take her photocopier to a technician for service.

loans.name: Acléo

texts.fr: Acléo M. est journaliste de la radio locale en ville de Kigali, il est né au Rwanda. Il a 33 ans et est célibataire. Il un diplôme de niveau licence en journalisme. Il est client d’ACB depuis 2010. Il besoin d’un prêt pour l’ordinateur portable (laptop) pour utiliser dans sa carrière de journalisme, ses ambitions sont de travailler à la hâte pour augmenter sa professionnalisme,  sa stratégie pour a croissance de l’affaires et d’augmenter pouvoir rédiger les informations de façon facile, enfin il veut chercher construire sa maison et pouvoir se marier.
texts.en: Acléo M. is a journalist at the local radio station in the city of Kigali. He is 33 years old and unmarried. He has a certificate in journalism. He has been a client of ACB since 2010. Acléo needs a loan for a laptop computer for use in his journalism career. His ambition is to work urgently to increase his professionalism. His strategy for growth is to have an easy way to write his material. Ultimately, he wants to build a house and to be able to get married.

loans.use: Buying a laptop

loans.name: Colomba

texts.es:
Colomba es una señora D. 53 años D. edad, resiD. en El Transito departamento D. San Miguel, vive con un hijo y la familia D. este, doña Colomba se dedica a la venta D. tortillas desD. hace 19 años, este negocio lo tiene en su casa y posee un buen número D. clientes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para compra maíz, leña, gas y una plancha para hacer las tortillas, con esta inversión espera mejorar las condiciones del negocio, aumentar la producción D. tortillas y generar mayores ganancias.
Doña Colomba tiene como objetivo que su negocio sea estable y competente para que le provea lo necesario para su vida cotidiana.
texts.en:
Colomba is a 53-year old woman who lives in El Transito in the department of San Miguel. She lives with one of her sons and his family. Colomba has been selling tortillas since she was 19 years old. She has her business in her house and she has a good number of clients. 

She requests a loan to purchase corn, firewood, propane base, and a cooking surface to make tortiallas. This investment will help her improve the conditions of her business and it will help her increase production of tortillas and earn a greater income. 

Colomba’s goal is to make her business stable and successful in order to have everything that she needs for her day to day life.

loans.use: To purchase corn, firewood, propane gas and a cooking surface to make tortillas.

loans.name: La Nueva Vida En Cristo Solidarity Group

texts.es: La señora Maria Catalina tiene 5 hijos del cual solo uno es menor de edad, los otros trabajan en el negocio también de frutas y verduras. Su problema principal es cuando no hay frutas que vender, ella tiene que dedicarse a otra alternativa de negocio. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de frutas, lo que hace ella es venderla en el mercado oriental en donde obtiene buenos precios al por mayor. José Luis es otro integrante del grupo, el habita en La Concepción, tiene un hijo de año y medio. Su éxito consiste en esperar hasta que haya poco producto, es cuando el precio incrementa y el aprovecha a sacar la producción. En su negocio tiene bastante competencia, sin embargo como el compra las cosechas el precio de costo es mucho menor que el de la competencia lo que le permite jugar con los precios del producto.
texts.en:
Ms. Maria Catalina has 5 children. Two are still minors and the others work in the fruit and vegetable business like her. Her main problem is when there is no fruit to sell, she has to find other work to do. She will use this loan to invest in the purchase of fruit that she will sell in the western market where she gets a good wholesale price.

José Luis is another member of the group. He lives in La Concepción and has a one and a half year old son. He has been successful because he waits until there is little product available, and when the price goes up he takes advantage to move his product. There is a good deal of competition in his business, but nevertheless, since he buys at harvest time his cost is much lower than that of the competition, which allows him to play with the prices of his products.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa Gavilánez empezó a raíz de la separación de su esposo quien se fue de viaje al exterior pese a que le envía dinero mensualmente. Ella opto por poner un negocio y generar su propio ingreso con lo cual gracias  a los créditos hechos en D-miro ha ido creciendo. 

Unas de sus dificultades es la ubicación del negocio ya que ha tenido que dejar solos a sus hijas por lo que incluso ha puesto un negocio pequeño en casa para entretenerlas. Está separada hace años tiene 3 hijos de 24, 17, 12 
Con el préstamo va a comprar productos, papeleria, articulos de bazar. Unas de sus metas si Dios lo permite seguir con la familia unida y crecer con el negocio y trasladarlo a casa para poder tener más tiempo con sus hijas.
texts.en:
Rosa Gavilánez openend her business as a result of her separation from her husband.  He left on a trip abroad, although he does send her money each month.  She has chosen to open a business to generate her own income.  Thanks to the loans granted by D-miro, her business has been growing. 

One of Rosa's difficulties is the location of her business; she has to leave her daughters home alone.  Because of that situation, she has even set up a small business in her home for their amusement.  Rosa has been separated for years.  Her three children are 24, 17 and 12 years old. 
With this loan, she is going to purchase products, stationary and  gift shop items.  Some of her goals, god willing, are to keep her family united, to grow her business and to transfer her business to her home so that she can have more time with her daughters.

loans.use: Stationary and other gift shop items

loans.name: Martha Lylian

texts.es:
Doña Marta, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, vive junto a sus dos hijos de 17 y 12 años de edad, el negocio es una sala de belleza, la tiene ubicada en El Transito lugar muy cercano desde hace 7 años, además en el negocio vende ropa y perfumería.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción, pues quiere repellar las paredes de un cuarto y ponerle piso cerámico, esta inversión será un gran avance para doña Marta quien desde hace un tiempo tiene planeado realizar estos cambios.
El objetivo es ofrecer a sus hijos una casa en mejores condiciones, trabajar fuerte porque no les falte ni educación, alimentación y salud.
texts.en:
Marta lives in San Rafael Oriente, in San Miguel department, with her two children who are 17 and 12.   Her business is a beauty salon which is located in a nearby town called El Transito and which she has owned for 7 years.  She also sells clothes and perfume.

Marta is requesting a loan to buy building supplies since she would like to plaster the walls of a room in her home and put down floor tiles.  This investment will represent a great step forward for Marta who has been planning to carry out the work for some time.

Marta's goal is to provide her children with a better home and to work hard so that they don't want for an education, food or good health.

loans.use: To buy building supplies (cement, sand and flooring)

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Nigdalia Irela

texts.es: La señora Nigdalia Irela tiene 46 años. La señora se dedica a una pulpería. Ella empezó con este negocio desde hace dos años,  nunca pensó que se dedicaría a esta actividad algún día. Ella empezó con este negocio como una búsqueda alternativa de una fuente de ingresos que le permitiera obtener ingresos adicionales por lo que es muy importante para ella y su familia, por lo que siempre se ha esforzado por proporcionarles a sus hijos lo necesario. Actualmente solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo y comprar productos necesarios como golosinas, pan, galletas y granos básicos. Sueña con mejorar su negocio y proporcionarle los ingresos necesarios para sufragar los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Señora Nigdalia Irela is 46 years old.  She makes her living running a general store.  She opened her business two years ago.  She never thought she'd be making her living in this way.  She began her business as she was searching for an alternative income source that would provide additional income.  The extra money is very important to her and to her family, as she has always made the effort to provide her children with whatever they need.  Currently, Señora Nigdalia is requesting the financing for working capital and to puchase some necessary products, like sweets, bread, cookies and basic grains.  She hopes to improve her business and earn enough income to defray her living expenses.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mwanzo Group

texts.en:
Obedi H. is 33 years old. He is married with three children; only one is a school-going child. Obedi runs a fruit and vegetable business and is also a carpenter. He works from 8:00 am to 10:00 pm.

This will be Obedi's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, after repaying his first loan successfully. Obedi is planning to use his current loan to expand his current business into a food store.

Obedi will share this loan with other members of "Mwanzo" group, fifteen in total. The members will hold each other accountable in repaying the loan. 

In the photo, Obedi is the only man in the first row in white shirt.

loans.use: To increase working capital for his fruit and vegetable business

loans.name: Ana Silvia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Ana Silvia, D. 38 años D. edad, vive con su esposo y cuatro hijos, residen en El Transito departamento D. San Miguel, ella se dedica a una sala D. belleza y tiene junto un negocio D. variedades (perfumes, cremas, ropas, maquillajes), tiene ya 6 años D. dedicarse al negocio.

Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar productos D. belleza y también quiere ampliar el local; con esta inversión espera atender mejor las exigencias D. los clientes, y al mismo tiempo aumentar sus actividades.

Lo que ella espera D. esta inversión es aumentar la clientela, tener un negocio más rentable que le ofrezca mejores ganancias para su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Silvia is 38 years old and lives with her husband and four children in El Transito, in San Miguel Department.  She owns a beauty salon and a business selling perfume, creams, clothes and makeup.  She has been in the business for 6 years.

Currently Ana Silvia is requesting a loan to buy beauty products.  She would also like to expand her premises.  With this investment, she hopes to be able to better meet her customers' demands and, at the same time, expand her businesses.

Ana Silvia hopes that this investment will help her to increase her number of customers and to have a more profitable business that will proviD. her with better profits for her family.

loans.use: To buy beauty products and to expand her premises

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Pedro soltero, sus hijos estudiantes, su objetivo que sus hijos se realicen como profesionales, trabaja como chofer en una empresa privada desde hace un tiempo pose su trabajo con responsabilidad. El proyecto es mejorar su vivienda para ofrecerles a sus hijos mayor comodidad y seguridad.
Solicitad el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, piedra, bloques, piedras canteras, alambre, láminas de zinc, perlines y estribus para la división de los cuartos con la sala de casa obteniendo beneficio anteriormente descripto.
Agradece a la financiera por la oportunidad y la confianza depositara para obtener el crédito, mejorando su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Pedro is single and his children are in school.  His goal is to see them become professionals.  For some time he has worked as a driver for a private company and his job carries a lot of responsibility with it.  

He plans to make home improvements so his children can live in a more comfortable and safer environment.  He will use the loan to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, stone, bricks, gravel, wire, zinc sheeting, metal profiles and abutments to separate the bedrooms from the living room.

He is grateful to the lending institution for the opportunity and confidence shown him in granting the loan so he can improve his lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy construction materials

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es: Martha Elena se dedica desde hace 6 años a la compra y venta de cerdo. Sus inicios fueron por su esposo quien anteriormente se dedicaba al negocio. Esta es su principal fuente de ingresos ya que la mayoría de sus clientes saben que ella siempre se esfuerza por proporcionarles a sus clientes una buena calidad en sus cerdos. El financiamiento que solicita actualmente es para la compra de materia prima como cerdos por lo que tiene que recorrer grandes distancias en ciertas comunidades para obtener precios favorables. El sueño de Martha es mantener este negocio activo que es su principal fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Martha Elena has made her living for the past 6 years buying and sellling pigs.  It began with her husband, who previously made his living with the same business.  This is her main income source, and most of her customers know that she always makes the effort to provide them with high quality pigs.  The loan that she is currently requesting is for the purchase of raw aterials, for instance, pigs.  She has to travel great distances in certain communities to get favorable pricing.  Martha's dream is to keep her business active as her prinicpal income source.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio, de 40  años, vive con su pareja y su pequeño hijo, quien es su razón de salir adelante; juntos se esfuerzan para salir adelante. 

Desde hace seis años, este trabajador hombre se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte por las diferentes calles de su zona. Gracias a su gran esfuerzo pudo adquirir su auto propio,  el cual hoy en día es la principal fuente de sustento de su familia, aunque su esposa también aporta con los gastos el hogar pues se dedica a la artesanía y vende muy bien su mercadería en adornos con motivos peruanos, juntos trabajan para progresar y sacar adelante a su pequeño hijo. El trabajo de Julio se prolonga durante todo el día y se da un pequeño receso  solo para almorzar pues si quiere obtener los ingresos deseados debe trabajar muy duro. Para el futuro desea comprar un auto para brindarlo en alquiler, de esta manera espera seguir adelante. 

Julio tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en mandar su auto al taller para que lo refaccionen, pues quiere brindar un buen servicio a sus pasajeros. 

Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso.
texts.en:
Julio, who is 40  years old, lives with his wife and their small son, who is his reason for working to get ahead.  Together, he and his wife put forth the effort to get ahead. 

For the last six years, this hard-working man has made his living offering transportation services in the differents streets of his neighborhood.  Thanks to his great effort, he was able to acquire his own vehicle.  Even though his wife contributes to the household expenses by selling handicrafts, (her Peruvian motifed adornments sell very well), Julio's transportaion services are the principal means of support for his family.  Together, he and his wife work to progress and to make a better life for their small son.  Julio works all day long taking only a short break for lunch.  In order to make the money that he wants, he needs to work hard.  In the future, he hopes to purchase a car to offer for rent, and in that way he hopes to continue getting ahead.

Julio plans to invest the requested money in sending his car to the shop to be refurbished; he wants to offer quality service to his passengers.

This is his second loan with MFP, and he promises to make timely payments.  He doesn't want to let down the people who have made it possible for him to obtain the money that has allowed him to continue working in search of progress.

loans.use: To send his car to the shop to be refurbished.

loans.name: Jose Herbert

texts.es:
José de 25 años de edad, reside en Concepción  Batres, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposa, poseen casa propia, él trabaja realizando viajes en moto taxi, desde hace 2 años.

Él actualmente tiene dificultades con su medio de transporte por lo que solicita un préstamo para llevar la moto taxi al mecánico, para hacerle la respectiva revisión y mantenimiento, este préstamo le será muy útil pues él no cuenta con los fondos necesarios para realizar la reparación.

Su objetivo es mantener la moto taxi en buenas condiciones, para dar a sus clientes un mejor servicio, cómodo y seguro, al mismo tiempo esta asegurando trabajo para vario tiempo y ganancias para su hogar.
texts.en:
José is 25 years old and lives in Concepción Batres, in Usulután department, with his wife.  They own their own home.  He has been providing transport services with his 'mototaxi' (a motorbike with a cabin in back for transporting passengers) for 2 years.

José is currently experiencing problems with his vehicle and is requesting a loan so that he can take his mototaxi to the garage so that it can have its inspection and service.  This loan will be very useful to him as he doesn't have the money he needs to have his vehicle repaired.

José's goal is to keep his mototaxi in good condition so that he can provide his customers with a better service that is both comfortable and safe.  At the same time, he is ensuring work and money for his household.

loans.use: To have his mototaxi serviced and repaired

loans.name: Segundo Manuel

texts.es:
Segundo de 37 años, empezó el negocio de venta de legumbres en su casa pero como las personas del sector no le pagaban puntual el decidió recorrer las calles de la Perimetral para tener más clientela. 

En la actualidad vende en compañía de su esposa verduras desde las 10h00am hasta las 17h00pm. Tienes muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere continuar trabajando para darle una buena vida a sus 4 hijos. Con el préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción para mejorar su vivienda y así que sus hijos estén mas cómodos.
texts.en:
Segundo, who is 37 years old, began his business by selling vegetables from his home.  However, because the people in his area didn't pay him on time, he decided to sell on the streets of Perimetral to gain more customers. 

Currently, Segundo makes his sales together with wife.  They sell vegetables from 10:00am until 5:00pm.  He has many aspiriations for his business, and that is why he wants to contiue working.  He also wants to give his 4 children a good life.  With this loan, he wants to purchase construction maierials to improve his home so that his children will be more comfortable.

loans.use: Construction materials

loans.name: Raúl

texts.es:
Raúl es un padre de familia de 63 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su familia en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

El cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio desde hace once años. Allí ofrece en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes, golosinas y bebidas gaseosas. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida debido a la buena calidad de los productos que ofrece y a la buena atención que brindan. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad ella se encarga del sostenimiento económicao de su familia.

La creciente demanda que su bodega ha venido experimentando ha hecho que piense en ampliarla adquiriendo más productos, sobre todo con la compra de útiles escolares por la campaña escolar, lo cual le brindará mayores ingresos y seguir invirtiendo. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Raúl is a 63 year-old father.  He is married and lives together with his family in the agricultural district of Tambogrande which is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Raúl has a small grocery store in his home which he has had for eleven years.  He offers his neighbors and customers staple products, essentials and groceries, candies and soda.  His business is very popular owing to the quality of the products that he sells and the good customer service that he provides.  He uses the profits from his business to financially support his family.

The growing demand that Raúl's store is experiencing has led him to think of expanding it, acquiring more products.  Above all, he would like to buy school supplies for the upcoming school year.  This will make him more income and he will be able to continue investing.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He believes that this will enable him to meet his customers' demand and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy school supplies for the upcoming school year

loans.name: Maria Susana

texts.es: Maria Susana tiene 54 años, su actividad es la venta de tortillas. A pesar de ser una actividad muy humilde ha sabido manejar su negocio de la mejor manera posible. Pues por medio de esta actividad es que les ha proporcionado a sus 3hijos lo necesario. Ella dio inicio hace 6 años cuando no tenía suficiente dinero para mantener a su familia, la ubicación es en su vivienda pues la mayoría de sus clientes son sus mismos vecinos y algunas personas que son de  otras comunidades. Este el motivo de su financiamiento para la compra de materia prima. Su deseo es incrementar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Maria Susana is 54 years old. Her business is the sale of tortillas. Although this is a humble activity, she has learned how to manage her business the best way possible. It is through this that she has provided the basics for her three children. She tells us that she began this business six years ago when she didn't have enough money to support her family. She sells the tortillas from her home, as the majority of her clients are her own neighbors and some people from other communities. The reason for her loan request is for the funding of raw materials for her business. She hopes to increase her working capital.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura tiene 52 años, es casada tiene 3 hijos.
Laura solicita un crédito de S/. 2000.00
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en comprar materiales como: telas diversas, hilos, agujas forros entre otros.
Laura y su esposo tiene una sastrería hace más de 10 años,  donde confeccionan: uniformes escolares, institucionales, ternos, pantalones , faldas.  Laura está en Finca Perú 4 ciclos y le gusta por la facilidad de los créditos, las capacitaciones que reciben en la familia matrimonio, negocio, empresarial, que lo pone en práctica en su vida diaria. Su sueño es que su negocio siga creciendo y poder abrir una boutique.
texts.en:
Laura is a 52-year-old married mother of three. She is requesting a 2,000.00 PEN loan. She is requesting this loan to invest it in purchasing materials like different types of fabric, thread, needles, lining, and other products.

For over 10 years, Laura and her husband have owned a tailor's shop in which they make school and company uniforms, suits, pants, and skirts. Laura has been a member of Finca Perú for 4 loan cycles, and she likes it because of the ease of obtaining a loan, and the family/marriage, and business classes that she receives, which she puts to practice in her daily life. Her dream is for her business to keep expanding and to be able to open up a boutique.

loans.use: Purchase fabric, thread, and other materials

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
Doña María de 49 años de edad, reside en Usulután, tiene un negocio donde vende productos necesarios para el hogar, ella vive junto a su esposo, una hija y una nieta de 6 años de edad, doña María tiene experiencia en el comercio, pues lleva varios años dedicándose a esta actividad.

Actualmente solicita un préstamo para compra mercadería y abastecer la tienda, su propósito es mantener el negocio en óptimas condiciones, brindar a los clientes lo necesario para el hogar con productos nuevos y a buen precio.

Los objetivos de doña María es mantenerse en el negocio, atender bien a los clientes, satisfacer las necesidades de estos, aumentar sus ventas y por consiguiente brindar a su familia una vida más confortable.
texts.en:
María is 49 years old and lives in Usulután together with her husband, a daughter and a 6 year-old granddaughter.  She has a business selling household products.  María has sales experience since she has been in this line of work for several years.

María is currently requesting a loan so that she can buy merchandise to stock her store.  Her aim is to keep her business in optimum condition and to provide her customers with what they need for their households by offering them new products at a good price.

María's goal is to keep her business going, to serve her customers well, to meet her customers' needs, to increase her sales and, consequently, to provide her family with a more comfortable life.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda es conviviente tiene 34 años, 3 hijos (16-10-5 años)
Solicita un crédito de S/ 2000.00
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercaderías para surtir su tienda.
Yolanda antes trabaja en las carreteras haciendo mantenimiento, junto un capital y abrir una tienda en su casa en el distrito de Acocro, donde vende abarrotes en general como : arroz azúcar, fideos, harina, huevos, detergentes, papel higiénico entre otros, ahora para la campaña escolar también venderá cuadernos, lápices, lapiceros, reglas, pinturas, entre otros,  le gusta Finca Perú, por la accebilidad a los créditos y el ahorro.
Su sueño es poder educar bien a sus hijos para que tengan mejores oportunidades que ella. Y poder ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 34 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children (ages 16, 10, and 5). She is requesting a loan of 2000 PEN and will invest in the purchase of merchandise to restock her store.

Yolanda previously worked doing road maintenance. With the capital she acquired, she opened a store in her house in the District of Acocro. She sells groceries such as rice, sugar, noodles, flour, eggs, detergents, toilet paper, and other items. Now she will sell products for the school year such as notebooks, pencils, pens, rulers, paints, and other supplies. She enjoys FINCA Peru because she can access loans and build up savings.

Her dream is to provide her children a good education so that they can have better opportunities than her. Yolanda also wants to expand her business.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her store

loans.name: Loyda

texts.es:
Loyda, de 32 años, vive en la casa de su madre al lado de ella, su hermana y sus dos pequeñas hijas; y cada día es de lucha constante para salir adelante. 

Desde hace 10 años, esta trabajadora mujer instaló en una pieza de su casa una tienda de comestibles variados y el tiempo le ha permitido surtirla cada vez más. Le gusta mucho su negocio pues no hay competencia cercana en su zona lo que le permite obtener regulares ganancias. Ella atiende la mayoría de veces sola, pero en las oportunidades que debe salir a comprar mas mercadería deja en el negocio a su sobrina; y como es una mujer que siempre piensa en el futuro ya planeo abastecer su negocio de útiles escolares, pues  se acerca la campaña escolar y quiere ofrecer lo mejor a sus habituales clientes, que muchas veces requieren de útiles para sus hijos y por lo alejado de la zona no lo pueden realizar. 

Loyda tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de cantidad de variada mercadería en útiles escolares, pues desea ampliar su negocio y mejorar sus ganancias. 

Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca  del progreso.
texts.en:
Loyda, age 32, lives with her mother in her home along with her sister and her two young daughters. Each day is a constant struggle to get ahead.

Ten years ago, this hardworking woman set aside part of her home in order to open a store where she now sells various food products. She was able to stock her business over time. Loyda enjoys managing her business since there is no other competition in her area, which allows her to generate steady income.
